[ Balor ]
Corruptor Enorme (demônio), Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 19 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 262 (21d12 + 126)
Deslocamento 12 mt., Voo 24 mt.
FOR
26 (+8)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
22 (+6)
INT
20 (+5)
SAB
16 (+3)
CAR
22 (+6)
Testes de Resistência For +14, Con +12, Sab +9, Car +12
Resistência a Dano frio, lightning; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano fogo, veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão verdadeira 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas Abyssal, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 19 (22000 XP)

Espasmos de Morte. When the balor dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a CD 20 (Destreza), sofrendo 70 (20d6) de dano de fogo se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the balor's weapons.

Aura Flamejante. At the start of each of the balor's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the balor or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) de dano de fogo.

Resistência à Magia. The balor has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Armas Mágicas. The balor's weapon attacks are magical.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The balor makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its whip.

Espada Longa. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +14 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 21 (3d8 + 8) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) lightning damage. If the balor scores a critical hit, it rolls damage dice three times, instead of twice.

Chicote. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +14 para atingir, alcance 9 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a CD 20 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 25 feet toward the balor.

Teletransporte. The balor magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

[ Bandit ]
Humanóide Médio (qualquer raça), any non-lawful alignment
Classe de Armadura 12 (leather armor)
Pontos de Vida 11 (2d8 + 2)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
11 (+0)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
12 (+1)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
10 (+0)
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas um idioma qualquer (geralmente Comum)
Nível de Desafio 1/8 (25 XP)
Ações

Scimitar. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d6 + 1) de dano cortante.

Light Crossbow. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +3 para atingir, distância 24 mt./36 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d8 + 1) de dano perfurante.

Bandits rove in gangs and are sometimes led by thugs, veterans, ou spellcasters. Not all bandits are evil. Oppression, drought, disease, ou famine can often drive otherwise honest folk to a life of banditry.
Pirates are bandits of the high seas. They might be freebooters interested only in treasure and murder, ou they might be privateers sanctioned by the crown to attack and plunder an enemy nation's vessels.
[ Bandit, capitaine ]
Humanóide Médio (qualquer raça), any non-lawful alignment
Classe de Armadura 15 (studded leather)
Pontos de Vida 65 (10d8 + 20)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
15 (+2)
DES
16 (+3)
CON
14 (+2)
INT
14 (+2)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
14 (+2)
Testes de Resistência For +4, Des +5, Sab +2
Perícias Athletics +4, Enganação +4
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas any two Idiomas
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The captain makes three melee attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its dagger. Or the captain makes two ranged attacks with its daggers.

Scimitar. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano cortante.

Dagger. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 20/18 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d4 + 3) de dano perfurante.

Parry. The captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

It takes a strong personality, ruthless cunning, and a silver tongue to keep a gang of bandits in line. The bandit captain has these qualities in spades.
In addition to managing a crew of selfish malcontents, the pirate captain is a variation of the bandit captain, with a ship to protect and command. To keep the crew in line, the captain must mete out rewards and punishment on a regular basis.
More than treasure, a bandit captain or pirate captain craves infamy. A prisoner who appeals to the captain's vanity or ego is more likely to be treated fairly than a prisoner who does not or claims not to know anything of the captain's colorful reputation.
[ Banshie ]
Medium undead, Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 58 (13d8)
Deslocamento 0 mt., Voo 12 mt. (planar)
FOR
1 (-5)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
10 (+0)
INT
12 (+1)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
17 (+3)
Testes de Resistência Sab +2, Car +5
Resistência a Dano ácido, fogo, lightning, trovejante; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano frio, necrotic, veneno
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, exausto, amedrontado, agarrado, paralisado, petrificado, envenenado, caído, restrained
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Comum, Elvish
Nível de Desafio 4 (1100 XP)

Detect Life. The banshee can magically sense the presence of creatures up to 5 miles away that aren't undead or constructs. She knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

Incorporeal Movement. The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 (1d10) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

Ações

Corrupting Touch. Melee Spell Attack: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 12 (3d6 + 2) necrotic damage.

Horrifying Visage. Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the banshee that can see her must succeed on a CD 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the banshee is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the banshee's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours.

Wail (1/Day). The banshee releases a mournful wail, provided that she isn't in sunlight. This wail has no effect on constructs and undead. All other creatures within 30 feet of her that can hear her must make a CD 13 (Constituição). On a failure, a creature drops to 0 Pontos de Vida. On a success, a creature takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

The woeful banshee is a spiteful creature formed from the spirit of a female elf. Its face is wreathed in a wild tangle of hair, its body clad in wispy rags that flutter and stream around it.
[ Diable barbelé ]
Medium fiend (devil), Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 15 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 110 (13d8 + 52)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
17 (+3)

14 (+2)

Perícias Enganação +5, Intuição +5, Percepção +8
Resistência a Dano frio; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos that aren't silvered
Imunidade a Dano fogo, veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 18
Idiomas Infernal, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Barbed Hide. At the start of each of its turns, the barbed devil deals 5 (1d10) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

Devil's Sight. Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's Visão no escuro.

Resistência à Magia. The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The devil makes three melee attacks: one with its tail and two with its claws. Alternatively, it can use Hurl Flame twice.

Garra. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano perfurante.

Cauda. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (2d6 + 3) de dano perfurante.

Hurl Flame. Ranged Spell Attack: +5 para atingir, distância 115 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (3d6) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

[ Barlgura ]
Large fiend (demônio), Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 15 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 68 (8d10 + 24)
Deslocamento 12 mt., Escalada 12 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
7 (-2)
SAB
14 (+2)
CAR
9 (-1)
Testes de Resistência Des +5, Con +6
Perícias Percepção +5, Furtividade +5
Resistência a Dano frio, fogo, lightning
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 9 mt., Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 15
Idiomas Abyssal, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Innate Spellcasting. The barlgura's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save CD 13). The barlgura can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

1/day each: entangle, phantasmal force
2/day each: disguise self, invisibility (self only)

Reckless. At the start of its turn, the barlgura can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

Running Leap. The barlgura's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet when it has a running start.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The barlgura makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its fists.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d6 + 4) de dano perfurante.

Fist. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 9 (1d10 + 4) de dano de concussão.

[ Basilic ]
Medium monstrosity, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 15 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 52 (8d8 + 16)
Deslocamento 6 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
8 (-1)
CON
15 (+2)
INT
2 (-4)
SAB
8 (-1)
CAR
7 (-2)
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 9
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 3 (700 XP)

Petrifying Gaze. If a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the basilisk and the two of them can see each other, the basilisk can force the creature to make a CD 12 Constitution saving throw if the basilisk isn't incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is restrained. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic. A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the basilisk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If it looks at the basilisk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If the basilisk sees its reflection within 30 feet of it in bright light, it mistakes itself for a rival and targets itself with its gaze.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (2d6 + 3) de dano perfurante mais 7 (2d6) de dano de veneno.

A basilisk is a multilegged, reptilian horror whose deadly gaze transforms victims into porous stone. With it strong jaws, the creature consumes this stone, which returns to organic form in its gullet.
[ Chauve-souris ]
Tiny beast, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 1 (1d4 - 1)
Deslocamento 1.5 mt., Voo 9 mt.
FOR
2 (-4)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
8 (-1)
INT
2 (-4)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
4 (-3)
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 0 (10 XP)

Echolocation. The bat can't use its Percepção às cegas while deafened.

Keen Hearing. The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on hearing.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +0 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 1 de dano perfurante.

[ Diable barbu ]
Medium fiend (devil), Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 13 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 52 (8d8 + 16)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
15 (+2)
INT
9 (-1)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
11 (+0)
Testes de Resistência For +5, Con +4, Sab +2
Resistência a Dano frio; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos that aren't silvered
Imunidade a Dano fogo, veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Infernal, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 3 (700 XP)

Devil's Sight. Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's Visão no escuro.

Resistência à Magia. The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Steadfast. The devil can't be frightened while it can see an allied creature within 30 feet of it.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The devil makes two attacks: one with its beard and one with its glaive.

Beard. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a CD 12 (Constituição) ou be envenenado for 1 minute. While envenenado in this way, the target can't regain Pontos de Vida. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Glaive. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a CD 12 (Constituição) ou lose 5 (1d10) Pontos de Vida at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 (1d10). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful CD 12 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

[ Béhir ]
Monstruosidade Enorme, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 17 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 168 (16d12 + 64)
Deslocamento 15 mt., Escalada 12 mt.
FOR
23 (+6)
DES
16 (+3)
CON
18 (+4)
INT
7 (-2)
SAB
14 (+2)
CAR
12 (+1)
Perícias Percepção +6, Furtividade +7
Imunidade a Dano elétrico
Sentidos Visão no escuro 27 mt., Percepção Passiva 16
Idiomas Dracônico
Nível de Desafio 11 (7200 XP)
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The behir makes two attacks: one with its bite and one to constrict.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +10 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 22 (3d10 + 6) de dano perfurante.

Constrict. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +10 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one Large or smaller creature. Acerto: 17 (2d10 + 6) de dano de concussão plus 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage. The target is grappled (escape CD 16) if the behir isn't already constricting a creature, and the target is restrained until this grapple ends.

Sopro Elétrico (Recarrega 5–6). The behir exhales a line of lightning that is 20 feet long and 5 feet wide. Cada criatura na linha deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência CD 16 (Destreza), sofrendo 66 (12d10) lightning damage se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

Swallow. The behir makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is blinded and impedido, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the behir, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the behir's turns. A behir can have only one creature swallowed at a time. If the behir takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the behir must succeed on a CD 14 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls prone in a space within 3 metros of the behir. If the behir dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

[ Tyrannoeil ]
Aberração Grande, Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 18 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 180 (19d10 + 76)
Deslocamento 0 mt., Voo 6 mt. (planar)

Imunidade a Condição caído

Nível de Desafio 13 (10000 XP)

As informações completas dessa criatura ainda não estão disponíveis.

[ Tyrannoeil zombi ]
Large undead, Neutro e mau

Reckless. At the start of its turn, the berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

Ações

Greataxe. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 9 (1d12 + 3) de dano cortante.

Sentidos Percepção às cegas 3 mt., Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Dracônico
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Anfíbio. O dragão pode respirar ar e água.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d10 + 2) de dano perfurante mais 2 (1d4) de dano de ácido.

Sopro Ácido (Recarrega 5-6). O dragão pode expelir ácido em uma 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Cada criatura na linha deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência CD 11 (Destreza), sofrendo 22 (5d8) de dano de ácido se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Pouding noir ]
Large ooze, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 7
Pontos de Vida 85 (10d10 + 30)
Deslocamento 6 mt., Escalada 6 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
5 (-3)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
1 (-5)
SAB
6 (-2)
CAR
1 (-5)
Imunidade a Dano ácido, frio, lightning, slashing
Imunidade a Condição blinded, enfeitiçado, deafened, exausto, amedrontado, prone
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 18 mt. (blind beyond this radius), Percepção Passiva 8
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 4 (1100 XP)

Amorphous. The pudding can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

Corrosive Form. A creature that touches the pudding or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 4 (1d8) acid damage. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal or wood that hits the pudding corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal or wood that hits the pudding is destroyed after dealing damage. The pudding can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical wood or metal in 1 round.

Spider Climb. The pudding can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Ações

Pseudopod. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano de concussão plus 18 (4d8) acid damage. In addition, nonmagical armor worn by the target is partly dissolved and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

REACTIONS

Split. When a pudding that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new puddings if it has at least 10 Pontos de Vida. Each new pudding has Pontos de Vida equal to half the original pudding's, rounded down. New puddings are one size smaller than the original pudding.

Teleport (Recarrega 4–6). The dog magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Before or after teleporting, the dog can make one bite attack.

A blink dog takes its name from its ability to blink in and out of existence, a talent it uses to aid its attacks and to avoid harm.

Charge. If the boar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) slashing damage. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 11 (Força) para não cair no chão.

Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest). If the boar takes 7 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 Pontos de Vida, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

Devil's Sight. Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's Visão no escuro.

Resistência à Magia. The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Arma de Sopro (Recarrega 5–6). O dragão usa um dos seguintes tipos de armas de sopro.

Sopro Flamejante. O dragão expele fogo numn 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Cada criatura na linha deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência CD 11 (Destreza), sofrendo 14 (4d6) de dano de fogo se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

Sopro Adormecente. The dragon exhales sleep gas in a cone de 4,5 metros. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 11 (Constituição) ou fall unconscious for 1 minute. This effect ends for a creature if the creature takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.

Sopro Elétrico. The dragon exhales lightning in a 40-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Cada criatura na linha deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência CD 12 (Destreza), sofrendo 16 (3d10) lightning damage se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

Sopro Repulsivo. The dragon exhales repulsion energy in a cone de 9 metros. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 12 (Força). On a failed save, the creature is pushed 30 feet away from the dragon.

Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Comum, Goblin

Brute. A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

Surprise Attack. If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.

Ações

Morningstar. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d8 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Javelin. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 30/16 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage in melee or 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage at range.

Bugbears are hairy goblinoids born for battle and mayhem. They survive by raiding and hunting, but are fond of setting ambushes and fleeing when outmatched.

[ Bulette ]
Large monstrosity, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 17 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 94 (9d10 + 45)
Deslocamento 12 mt., Escavação 12 mt.
FOR
19 (+4)
DES
11 (+0)
CON
21 (+5)
INT
2 (-4)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
5 (-3)
Perícias Percepção +6
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., tremorsense 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 16
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Standing Leap. The bulette's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 30 (4d12 + 4) de dano perfurante.

Deadly Leap. If the bulette jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a CD 16 Strength or (Destreza) (target's choice) or be knocked prone and take 14 (3d6 + 4) de dano de concussão plus 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked caído, and is pushed 5 feet out of the bulette's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls prone in the bulette's space.

Standing Leap. The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 3 metros, with or without a running start.

Perícias Athletics +6, Percepção +3, Survival +3
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas Elvish, Sylvan
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Charge. If the centaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) de dano perfurante.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The centaur makes two attacks: one with its pike and one with its hooves or two with its longbow.

Pike. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 9 (1d10 + 4) de dano perfurante.

Hooves. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d6 + 4) de dano de concussão.

Longbow. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, distância 150/600 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d8 + 2) de dano perfurante.

A centaur has the body of a great horse topped by a humanoid torso, head, and arms. Reclusive wanderers, they avoid conflict but fight fiercely when pressed.
[ Diable à chaînes ]
Medium fiend (devil), Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 16 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 85 (10d8 + 40)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
18 (+4)
INT
11 (+0)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
14 (+2)
Testes de Resistência Con +7, Sab +4, Car +5
Resistência a Dano frio; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos that aren't silvered
Imunidade a Dano fogo, veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas Infernal, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 8 (3900 XP)

Devil's Sight. Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's Visão no escuro.

Resistência à Magia. The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The devil makes two attacks with its chains.

Chain. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +8 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. The target is grappled (escape CD 14) if the devil isn't already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 7 (2d6) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns.

Animate Chains (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest). Up to four chains the devil can see within 60 feet of it magically sprout razor-edged barbs and animate under the devil's control, provided that the chains aren't being worn or carried. Each animated chain is an object with AC 20, 20 Pontos de Vida, resistance to piercing damage, and immunity to psychic and thunder damage. When the devil uses Multiattack on its turn, it can use each animated chain to make one additional chain attack. An animated chain can grapple one creature of its own but can't make attacks while grappling. An animated chain reverts to its inanimate state if reduced to 0 Pontos de Vida or if the devil is incapacitated or dies.

REACTIONS

Unnerving Mask. When a creature the devil can see starts its turn within 30 feet of the devil, the devil can create the illusion that it looks like one of the creature's departed loved ones or bitter enemies. If the creature can see the devil, it must succeed on a CD 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its turn.

[ Chasme ]

Pontos de Vida 84 (13d10 + 13)
Deslocamento 6 mt., Voo 18 mt.

Perícias Percepção +5
Resistência a Dano frio, fogo, lightning
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 3 mt., Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 15
Idiomas Abyssal, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 6 (2300 XP)

As informações completas dessa criatura ainda não estão disponíveis.

[ Chimère ]
Large monstrosity, Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 14 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 114 (12d10 + 48)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 18 mt.
FOR
19 (+4)
DES
11 (+0)
CON
19 (+4)
INT
3 (-4)
SAB
14 (+2)
CAR
10 (+0)
Perícias Percepção +8
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 18
Idiomas understands Dracônico but can't speak
Nível de Desafio 6 (2300 XP)
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The chimera makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its horns, and one with its claws. When its fire breath is available, it can use the breath in place of its bite or horns.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d6 + 4) de dano perfurante.

Horns. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (1d12 + 4) de dano de concussão.

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d6 + 4) de dano cortante.

Sopro Flamejante (Recarrega 5–6). The dragon head exhales fire in a cone de 4,5 metros. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 15 (Destreza), sofrendo 31 (7d8) de dano de fogo se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

A chimera is a vile combination of goat, lion, and dragon, and features the heads of all three of those creatures. It likes to swoop down from the sky and engulf prey with its fiery breath before landing to attack.
[ Chuul ]
Aberração Grande, Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 16 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 93 (11d10 + 33)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Natação 9 mt.
FOR
19 (+4)
DES
10 (+0)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
5 (-3)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
5 (-3)
Perícias Percepção +4
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas understands Dialeto Subterrâneo but can't speak
Nível de Desafio 4 (1100 XP)

Anfíbio. The chuul can breathe air and water.

Sense Magic. The chuul Sentidos magic within 120 feet of it at will. This trait otherwise works like the detect magic spell but isn't itself magical.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The chuul makes two pincer attacks. If the chuul is grappling a creature, the chuul can also use its tentacles once.

Pincer. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d6 + 4) de dano de concussão. The target is grappled (escape CD 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature and the chuul doesn't have two other creatures grappled.

Tentacles. One creature grappled by the chuul must succeed on a CD 13 (Constituição) ou be envenenado for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

[ Golem d'argile ]
Large construct, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 14 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 133 (14d10 + 56)
Deslocamento 6 mt.
FOR
20 (+5)
DES
9 (-1)
CON
18 (+4)
INT
3 (-4)
SAB
8 (-1)
CAR
1 (-5)
Imunidade a Dano ácido, veneno, psychic; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos que não sejam de adamante
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, exausto, amedrontado, paralisado, petrificado, envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 9
Idiomas compreende os idiomas do seu criador, mas não pode falar
Nível de Desafio 9 (5000 XP)

Absorção de Ácido. Whenever the golem is subjected to acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of Pontos de Vida equal to the acid damage dealt.

Fúria. Whenever the golem starts its turn with 60 Pontos de Vida or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its Pontos de Vida.

Immutable Form. The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Resistência à Magia. The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Armas Mágicas. The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The golem makes two slam attacks.

Pancada. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +8 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 16 (2d10 + 5) de dano de concussão. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 15 (Constituição) ou have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this attack reduces its hit point maximum to 0. The reduction lasts until removed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

Haste (Recarrega 5–6). Until the end of its next turn, the golem magically gains a +2 bonus to its AC, has advantage on (Destreza)s, and can use its slam attack as a bonus action.

[ Manteleur ]
Aberração Grande, chaotic Neutro
Classe de Armadura 14 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 78 (12d10 + 12)
Deslocamento 3 mt., Voo 12 mt.
FOR
17 (+3)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
12 (+1)
INT
13 (+1)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
14 (+2)
Perícias Furtividade +5
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas Dialeto Subterrâneo, Undercommon
Nível de Desafio 8 (3900 XP)

Damage Transfer. While attached to a creature, the cloaker takes only half the damage dealt to it (rounded down), and that creature takes the other half.

False Appearance. While the cloaker remains motionless without its underside exposed, it is indistinguishable from a dark leather cloak.

Light Sensitivity. While in bright light, the cloaker has disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The cloaker makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, the cloaker attaches to it. If the cloaker has advantage against the target, the cloaker attaches to the target's head, and the target is blinded and unable to breathe while the cloaker is attached. While attached, the cloaker can make this attack only against the target and has advantage on the attack roll. The cloaker can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. A creature, including the target, can take its action to detach the cloaker by succeeding on a CD 16 Strength check.

Cauda. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., one creature. Acerto: 7 (1d8 + 3) de dano cortante.

Moan. Each creature within 60 feet of the cloaker that can hear its moan and that isn't an aberration must succeed on a CD 13 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the end of the cloaker's next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the cloaker's moan for the next 24 hours

Phantasms (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest). The cloaker magically creates three illusory duplicates of itself if it isn't in bright light. The duplicates move with it and mimic its actions, shifting position so as to make it impossible to track which cloaker is the real one. If the cloaker is ever in an area of bright light, the duplicates disappear. Whenever any creature targets the cloaker with an attack or a harmful spell while a duplicate remains, that creature rolls randomly to determine whether it targets the cloaker or one of the duplicates. A creature is unaffected by this magical effect if it can't see or if it relies on Sentidos other than sight. A duplicate has the cloaker's AC and uses its saving throws. If an attack hits a duplicate, ou if a duplicate fails a saving throw against an effect that deals damage, the duplicate disappears.

[ Géant des nuages ]
Huge giant, Neutro e Bom (50 %) or Neutro e mau (50 %)
Classe de Armadura 14 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 200 (16d12 + 96)
Deslocamento 12 mt.
FOR
27 (+8)
DES
10 (+0)
CON
22 (+6)
INT
12 (+1)
SAB
16 (+3)
CAR
16 (+3)
Testes de Resistência Con +10, Sab +7, Car +7
Perícias Intuição +7, Percepção +7
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 17
Idiomas Comum, Giant
Nível de Desafio 9 (5000 XP)

Keen Smell. The giant has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on smell.

InnateSpellcasting. The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect magic, fog cloud, light
3/day each: feather fall, fly, misty step, telekinesis
1/day each: control weather, gaseous form
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The giant makes two morningstar attacks.

Morningstar. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +12 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 21 (3d8 + 8) de dano perfurante.

Rock. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +12 para atingir, distância 60/212 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 30 (4d10 + 8) de dano de concussão.

A cloud giant earns its place in the ordning by the treasure it accumulates, the wealth it wears, and the gifts it bestows on other cloud giants.
[ Cockatrice ]
Small monstrosity, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 11
Pontos de Vida 27 (6d6 + 6)
Deslocamento 6 mt., Voo 12 mt.
FOR
6 (-2)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
12 (+1)
INT
2 (-4)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
5 (-3)
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)
Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a CD 11 Constitution saving throw against being magically petrified. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is restrained. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified for 24 hours.

The cockatrice looks like a hideous hybrid of lizard, bird, and bat. It is infamous for its ability to turn flesh to stone.

Commoners include peasants, serfs, slaves, servants, pilgrims, merchants, artisans, and hermits.

[ Dragon de cuivre, nouveau-né ]
Dragão Médio, Caótico e Bom
Classe de Armadura 16 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 22 (4d8 + 4)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Escalada 9 mt., Voo 18 mt.
FOR
15 (+2)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
13 (+1)
INT
14 (+2)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
13 (+1)
Testes de Resistência Des +3, Con +3, Sab +2, Car +3
Perícias Percepção +4, Furtividade +3
Imunidade a Dano ácido
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 3 mt., Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Dracônico
Nível de Desafio 1 (200 XP)
Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d10 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Arma de Sopro (Recarrega 5–6). O dragão usa um dos seguintes tipos de armas de sopro.

Sopro Ácido. O dragão pode expelir ácido em uma 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Cada criatura na linha deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência CD 11 (Destreza), sofrendo 18 (4d8) de dano de ácido se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

Slowing Breath. O dragão expele gás num cone de 4,5 metros. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 11 (Constituição). Se falhar na resistência, a criatura não pode realizar reações, seu deslocamento é reduzido à metade e ela não pode realizar mais de um ataque por rodada. Além disso, a criatura pode usar ou um ação ouum ação bônus no turno dela, mas não ambas. Esse efeito dura por 1 minuto. A criatura pode repetir o teste de resistência em cada um dos turnos dela, terminando o efeito caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Couatl ]
Medium celestial, leal e Bom
Classe de Armadura 19 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 97 (13d8 + 39)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 27 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
20 (+5)
CON
17 (+3)
INT
18 (+4)
SAB
20 (+5)
CAR
18 (+4)
Testes de Resistência Con +5, Sab +7, Car +6
Resistência a Dano radiant
Imunidade a Dano psychic; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Sentidos Visão verdadeira 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 15
Idiomas all, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 4 (1100 XP)

Innate Spellcasting. The couatl's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

At will: detect evil and good, detect magic, detect thoughts
3/day each: bênção, create food and water, curar ferimentos, lesser restoration, protection from poison, santuário, shield
1/day each: dream, greater restoration, scrying

Armas Mágicas. The couatl's weapon attacks are magical.

Shielded Mind. The couatl is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, ou detect its location.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +8 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a CD 13 (Constituição) ou be envenenado for 24 hours. Until this poison ends, the target is unconscious. Another creature can use an action to shake the target awake.

Constrict. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., one Medium or smaller creature. Acerto: 10 (2d6 + 3) de dano de concussão, and the target is grappled (escape CD 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is impedido, and the couatl can't constrict another target.

Mudar Forma. The couatl magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a Nível de Desafio rating equal to or less than its own, ou back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the couatl's choice). In a new form, the couatl retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and other actions are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks. If the new form has a bite attack, the couatl can use its bite in that form.

[ Fanatique ]
Humanóide Médio (qualquer raça), any non-good alignment
Classe de Armadura 13 (leather armor)
Pontos de Vida 33 (6d8 + 6)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
11 (+0)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
12 (+1)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
14 (+2)
Perícias Enganação +4, Persuasão +4, Religião +2
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas um idioma qualquer (geralmente Comum)
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Dark Devotion. The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Conjuração. The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save CD 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared:

Truques (à vontade): luz, chama sagrada, taumaturgia
1° nível (4 espaços): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith
2° nível (3 espaços): hold person, spiritual weapon
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The fanatic makes two melee attacks.

Dagger. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 20/18 mt., one creature. Acerto: 4 (1d4 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Fanatics are often part of a cult's leadership, using their charisma and dogma to influence and prey on those of weak will. Most are interested in personal power above all else.
[ Cultiste ]
Humanóide Médio (qualquer raça), any non-good alignment
Classe de Armadura 12 (leather armor)
Pontos de Vida 9 (2d8)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
11 (+0)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
10 (+0)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
10 (+0)
Perícias Enganação +2, Religião +2
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas um idioma qualquer (geralmente Comum)
Nível de Desafio 1/8 (25 XP)

Dark Devotion. The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Ações

Scimitar. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 4 (1d6 + 1) de dano cortante.

Cultists swear allegiance to dark powers such as elemental princes, demon lords, ou archdevils. Most conceal their loyalties to avoid being ostracized, imprisoned, ou executed for their beliefs. Unlike evil acolytes, cultists often show signs of insanity in their beliefs and practices.
[ Cyclope ]
Huge giant, chaotic Neutro
Classe de Armadura 14 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 138 (12d12 + 60)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
22 (+6)
DES
11 (+0)
CON
20 (+5)
INT
8 (-1)
SAB
6 (-2)
CAR
10 (+0)
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 8
Idiomas Giant
Nível de Desafio 6 (2300 XP)

Poor Depth Percepção. The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The cyclops makes two greatclub attacks.

Greatclub. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +9 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 19 (3d8 + 6) de dano de concussão.

Rock. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +9 para atingir, distância 30/16 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 28 (4d10 + 6) de dano de concussão.

Cyclopes are one-eyed giants that eke out a meager existence in wild lands. They are a terrifying threat in combat due to their size and strength, but they can often be tricked by clever foes.
[ Dao ]
Elemental Grande, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 18 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 187 (15d10 + 105)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Escavação 9 mt., Voo 9 mt.
FOR
23 (+6)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
24 (+7)
INT
12 (+1)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
14 (+2)
Testes de Resistência Int +5, Sab +5, Car +6
Imunidade a Condição petrified
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas Terran
Nível de Desafio 11 (7200 XP)

Earth Glide. The dao can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the dao doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

Elemental Demise. If the dao dies, its body disintegrates into crystalline powder, leaving behind only equipment the dao was wearing or carrying.

Innate Spellcasting. The dao's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect evil and good, detect magic, stone shape
3/day each: passwall, move earth, tongues
1/day each: conjure elemental (earth elemental only), gaseous form, invisibility, phantasmal killer, plane shift, wall of stone

Sure-Footed. The dao has advantage on Strength and (Destreza)s made against effects that would knock it prone.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The dao makes two fist attacks or two maul attacks.

Fist. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +10 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 15 (2d8 + 6) de dano de concussão.

Maul. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +10 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 20 (4d6 + 6) de dano de concussão. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a CD 18 Strength check or be knocked prone.

[ Mante obscure ]
Small monstrosity, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 11
Pontos de Vida 22 (5d6 + 5)
Deslocamento 3 mt., Voo 9 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
13 (+1)
INT
2 (-4)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
5 (-3)
Perícias Furtividade +3
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Echolocation. The darkmantle can't use its Percepção às cegas while deafened.

False Appearance. While the darkmantle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a cave formation such as a stalactite or stalagmite.

Ações

Crush. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano de concussão, and the darkmantle attaches to the target. If the target is Medium or smaller and the darkmantle has advantage on the attack roll, it attaches by engulfing the target's head, and the target is also blinded and unable to breathe while the darkmantle is attached in this way. While attached to the target, the darkmantle can attack no other creature except the target but has advantage on its attack rolls. The darkmantle's Deslocamento also becomes 0, it can't benefit from any bonus to its Deslocamento, and it moves with the target. A creature can detach the darkmantle by making a successful CD 13 Strength check as an action. On its turn, the darkmantle can detach itself from the target by using 5 feet of movement.

Darkness Aura (1/Day). A 15-foot radius of magical darkness extends out from the darkmantle, moves with it, and spreads around corners. The darkness lasts as long as the darkmantle maintains concentration, up to 10 minutes (as if concentrating on a spell). Visão no escuro can't penetrate this darkness, and no natural light can illuminate it. If any of the darkness overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell creating the light is dispelled.

[ Chien du trépas ]
Medium monstrosity, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 39 (6d8 + 12)
Deslocamento 12 mt.
FOR
15 (+2)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
14 (+2)
INT
3 (-4)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
6 (-2)
Perícias Percepção +5, Furtividade +4
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 15
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 1 (200 XP)

Two-Headed. The dog has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, enfeitiçado, deafened, amedrontado, stunned, ou knocked unconscious.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The dog makes two bite attacks.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 12 Constitution saving throw against disease or become envenenado until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the creature must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 (1d10) on a failure. This reduction lasts until the disease is cured. The creature dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

A death dog is an ugly two-headed hound that roams plains, deserts, and the Underdark.

[ Gnome des profondeurs (svirfnebelin) ]
Small humanoid (gnome), Neutro e Bom
Classe de Armadura 15 (chain shirt)
Pontos de Vida 16 (3d6 + 6)
Deslocamento 6 mt.
FOR
15 (+2)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
14 (+2)
INT
12 (+1)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
9 (-1)
Perícias Investigation +3, Percepção +2, Furtividade +4
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas Gnomish, Terran, Undercommon
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Stone Camouflage. The gnome has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

Gnome Cunning. The gnome has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

Innate Spellcasting. The gnome's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save CD 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: nondetection (self only)
1/day each: blindness/deafness, blur, disguise self
Ações

War Pick. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d8 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Poisoned Dart. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, distância 30/16 mt., one creature. Acerto: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a CD 12 (Constituição) ou be envenenado for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

[ Déva ]
Medium celestial, leal e Bom
Classe de Armadura 17 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 136 (16d8 + 64)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 27 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
18 (+4)
CON
18 (+4)
INT
17 (+3)
SAB
20 (+5)
CAR
20 (+5)
Testes de Resistência Sab +9, Car +9
Perícias Intuição +9, Percepção +9
Resistência a Dano radiant; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, exausto, amedrontado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 19
Idiomas all, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 10 (5900 XP)

Angelic Weapons. The deva's weapon attacks are magical. When the deva hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 4d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

Innate Spellcasting. The deva's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 17). The deva can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

At will: detect evil and good
1/day each: commune, raise dead

Resistência à Magia. The deva has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The deva makes two melee attacks.

Mace. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +8 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d6 + 4) de dano de concussão plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage.

Healing Touch (3/Dia). The deva touches another creature. The target magically regains 20 (4d8 + 2) Pontos de Vida and is freed from any curse, disease, veneno, blindness, ou deafness.

Mudar Forma. The deva magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a Nível de Desafio rating equal to or less than its own, ou back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the deva's choice). In a new form, the deva retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special Sentidos are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.

[ Loup sanguinaire ]
Besta Grande, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 14 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 37 (5d10 + 10)
Deslocamento 15 mt.
FOR
17 (+3)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
15 (+2)
INT
3 (-4)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
7 (-2)
Perícias Percepção +3, Furtividade +4
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 1 (200 XP)

Keen Hearing and Smell. The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

Pack Tactics. The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 13 (Força) para não cair no chão.

[ Djinn ]
Elemental Grande, Caótico e Bom
Classe de Armadura 17 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 161 (14d10 + 84)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 27 mt.
FOR
21 (+5)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
22 (+6)
INT
15 (+2)
SAB
16 (+3)
CAR
20 (+5)
Testes de Resistência Des +6, Sab +7, Car +9
Imunidade a Dano elétrico, thunder
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas Auran
Nível de Desafio 11 (7200 XP)

Elemental Demise. If the djinni dies, its body disintegrates into a warm breeze, leaving behind only equipment the djinni was wearing or carrying.

Innate Spellcasting. The djinni's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect evil and good, detect magic, thunderwave
3/day each: create food and water (can create wine instead of water), tongues, wind walk
1/day each: conjure elemental (air elemental only), creation, gaseous form, invisibility, major image, plane shift
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The djinni makes three scimitar attacks.

Scimitar. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +9 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) lightning or thunder damage (djinni's choice).

Create Whirlwind. A 5-foot-radius, 30-foot-tall cylinder of swirling air magically forms on a point the djinni can see within 120 feet of it. The whirlwind lasts as long as the djinni maintains concentration (as if concentrating on a spell). Any creature but the djinni that enters the whirlwind must succeed on a CD 18 Strength saving throw or be restrained by it. The djinni can move the whirlwind up to 60 feet as an action, and creatures restrained by the whirlwind move with it. The whirlwind ends if the djinni loses sight of it. A creature can use its action to free a creature restrained by the whirlwind, including itself, by succeeding on a CD 18 Strength check. If the check succeeds, the creature is no longer restrained and moves to the nearest space outside the whirlwind.

[ Doppelganger ]
Medium monstrosity (shapechanger), Neutro
Classe de Armadura 14
Pontos de Vida 52 (8d8 + 16)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
11 (+0)
DES
18 (+4)
CON
14 (+2)
INT
11 (+0)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
14 (+2)
Perícias Enganação +6, Intuição +3
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas Comum
Nível de Desafio 3 (700 XP)

Shapechanger. The doppelganger can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Humanóide Médio it has seen, ou back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Ambusher. In the first round of a combat, the doppelganger has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

Surprise Attack. If the doppelganger surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage from the attack.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The doppelganger makes two melee attacks.

Pancada. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d6 + 4) de dano de concussão.

Read Thoughts. The doppelganger magically reads the surface thoughts of one creature within 60 feet of it. The effect can penetrate barriers, but 3 feet of wood or dirt, 2 feet of stone, 2 inches of metal, ou a thin sheet of lead blocks it. While the target is in range, the doppelganger can continue reading its thoughts, as long as the doppelganger's concentration isn't broken (as if concentrating on a spell). While reading the target's mind, the doppelganger has advantage on Wisdom (Insight) and Charisma (Deception, Intimidation, and Persuasion) checks against the target.

Doppelgangers are devious shapeshifters that take on the appearance of other humanoids, throwing off pursuit or luring victims to their doom with misdirection and disguise.

18 (+4)

7 (-2)

Hooves. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 9 (2d4 + 4) de dano de concussão.

[ Dragon-tortue ]
Dragão Imenso, Neutro
Classe de Armadura 20 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 341 (22d20 + 110)
Deslocamento 6 mt., Natação 12 mt.
FOR
25 (+7)
DES
10 (+0)
CON
20 (+5)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
12 (+1)
Testes de Resistência Des +6, Con +11, Sab +7
Resistência a Dano fogo
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas Aquan, Dracônico
Nível de Desafio 17 (18000 XP)

Anfíbio. The dragon turtle can breathe air and water.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The dragon turtle makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It can make one tail attack in place of its two claw attacks.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +13 para atingir, alcance 4.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 26 (3d12 + 7) de dano perfurante.

Garra. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +13 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 16 (2d8 + 7) de dano cortante.

Cauda. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +13 para atingir, alcance 4.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 26 (3d12 + 7) de dano de concussão. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 20 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 3 metros away from the dragon turtle and knocked prone.

Steam Breath (Recarrega 5–6). The dragon turtle exhales scalding steam in a cone de 18 metros. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 18 (Constituição), sofrendo 52 (15d 6) de dano de fogo se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.

[ Dretch ]
Small fiend (demônio), Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 11 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 18 (4d6 + 4)
Deslocamento 6 mt.
FOR
11 (+0)
DES
11 (+0)
CON
12 (+1)
INT
5 (-3)
SAB
8 (-1)
CAR
3 (-4)
Resistência a Dano frio, fogo, lightning
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 9
Idiomas Abyssal, Telepatia 18 mt. (works only with creatures that understand Abyssal)
Nível de Desafio 1/4 (50 XP)
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The dretch makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +2 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 3 (1d6) de dano perfurante.

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +2 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (2d4) de dano cortante.

Fetid Cloud (1/Day). A 10-foot radius of disgusting green gas extends out from the dretch. The gas spreads around corners, and its area is lightly obscured. It lasts for 1 minute or until a strong wind disperses it. Any creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a CD 11 (Constituição) ou be envenenado until the start of its next turn. While envenenado in this way, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both, and can't take reactions.

[ Drider ]
Large monstrosity, Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 19 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 123 (13d10 + 52)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Escalada 9 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
16 (+3)
CON
18 (+4)
INT
13 (+1)
SAB
14 (+2)
CAR
12 (+1)
Perícias Percepção +5, Furtividade +9
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 15
Idiomas Elvish, Undercommon
Nível de Desafio 6 (2300 XP)

Fey Ancestry. The drider has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drider to sleep.

Innate Spellcasting. The drider's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save CD 13). The drider can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: dancing lights
1/day each: darkness, faerie fire

Spider Climb. The drider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Web Walker. The drider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The drider makes three attacks, either with its longsword or its longbow. It can replace one of those attacks with a bite attack.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 2 (1d4) de dano perfurante mais 9 (2d8) de dano de veneno.

Espada Longa. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, ou 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Longbow. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +6 para atingir, distância 150/600 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d8 + 3) de dano perfurante mais 4 (1d8) de dano de veneno.

[ Drow ]
Humanóide Médio (elf), Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 15 (chain shirt)
Pontos de Vida 13 (3d8)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
10 (+0)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
10 (+0)
INT
11 (+0)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
12 (+1)
Perícias Percepção +2, Furtividade +4
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas Elvish, Undercommon
Nível de Desafio 1/4 (50 XP)

Fey Ancestry. The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

Innate Spellcasting. The drow's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: dancing lights
1/day each: darkness, faerie fire

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Ações

Shortsword. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Hand Crossbow. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, distância 30/16 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a CD 13 (Constituição) ou be envenenado for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious while envenenado in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

[ Drow, guerrier d'élite ]

[ Drow, mage ]
Humanóide Médio (elf), Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 12 (15 with mage armor)
Pontos de Vida 45 (10d8)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
9 (-1)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
10 (+0)
INT
17 (+3)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
12 (+1)
Perícias Arcana +6, Enganação +5, Percepção +4, Furtividade +5
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Elvish, Undercommon
Nível de Desafio 7 (2900 XP)

Fey Ancestry. The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

Innate Spellcasting. The drow's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: dancing lights
1/day each: darkness, faerie fire, levitate (self only)

Conjuração. The drow is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save CD 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The drow has the following wizard spells prepared:

Truques (à vontade): mage hand, minor illusion, poison spray, ray of frost
1° nível (4 espaços): mage armor, magic missile, shield, witch bolt
2° nível (3 espaços): alter self, misty step, web
3° nível (3 espaços): fly, lightning bolt
4° nível (3 espaços): Evard's black tentacles, greater invisibility
5° nível (2 espaços): cloudkill

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Ações

Staff. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +2 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 2 (1d6 - 1) de dano de concussão, ou 3 (1d8 - 1) de dano de concussão if used with two hands, plus 3 (1d 6) de dano de veneno.

Summon Demon (1/Day). The drow magically summons a quasit, ou attempts to summon a shadow demon with a 50 percent chance of success. The summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, ou until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

[ Druide ]
Humanóide Médio (qualquer raça), qualquer tendência
Classe de Armadura 11 (16 with barkskin)
Pontos de Vida 27 (5d8 + 5)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
10 (+0)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
13 (+1)
INT
12 (+1)
SAB
15 (+2)
CAR
11 (+0)
Perícias Medicina +4, Nature +3, Percepção +4
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Druidic plus any two Idiomas
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Conjuração. The druid is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save CD 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

Truques (à vontade): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh
1° nível (4 espaços): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave
2° nível (3 espaços): animal messenger, barkskin
Ações

Quarterstaff. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 3 (1d6) de dano de concussão, 4 (1d8) de dano de concussão if wielded with two hands, ou 6 (1d8 + 2) de dano de concussão with shillelagh.

Druids dwell in forests and other secluded wilderness locations, where they protect the natural world from monsters and the encroachment of civilization. Some are tribal shamans who heal the sick, pray to animal spirits, and provide spiritual guidance.
[ Dryade ]
Medium fey, Neutro
Classe de Armadura 11 (16 with barkskin)
Pontos de Vida 22 (5d8)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
10 (+0)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
11 (+0)
INT
14 (+2)
SAB
15 (+2)
CAR
18 (+4)
Perícias Percepção +4, Furtividade +5
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Elvish, Sylvan
Nível de Desafio 1 (200 XP)

Innate Spellcasting. The dryad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 14). The dryad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: druidcraft
3/day each: entangle, goodberry
1/day each: barkskin, pass without trace, shillelagh

Resistência à Magia. The dryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Speak with Beasts and Plants. The dryad can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

Tree Stride. Once on her turn, the dryad can use 3 metros of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

Ações

Clava. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +2 to hit (+6 to hit with shillelagh), alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 2 (1d4) de dano de concussão, ou 8 (1d8 + 4) de dano de concussão with shillelagh.

Fey Charm. The dryad targets one humanoid or beast that she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see the dryad, it must succeed on a CD 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed. The charmed creature regards the dryad as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the dryad's control, it takes the dryad's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can. Each time the dryad or its allies do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the dryad dies, is on a different plane of existence from the target, ou ends the effect as a bonus action. If a target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the dryad's Fey Charm for the next 24 hours. The dryad can have no more than one humanoid and up to three beasts charmed at a time.

[ Duergar ]
Humanóide Médio (dwarf), Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 16 (scale mail, shield)
Pontos de Vida 26 (4d8 + 8)
Deslocamento 21.5 mt.
FOR
14 (+2)
DES
11 (+0)
CON
14 (+2)
INT
11 (+0)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
9 (-1)
Resistência a Dano veneno
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Dwarvish, Undercommon
Nível de Desafio 1 (200 XP)

Duergar Resilience. The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Ações

Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest). For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

War Pick. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, ou 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage while enlarged.

Javelin. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 30/16 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, ou 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage while enlarged.

Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest). The duergar magically turns invisible until it attacks, casts a spell, ou uses its Enlarge, ou until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is invisible with it.

[ Méphite de poussière ]
Small elemental, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 17 (5d6)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 9 mt.
FOR
5 (-3)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
10 (+0)
INT
9 (-1)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
10 (+0)
Perícias Percepção +2, Furtividade +4
Damage vulnerabilities fogo
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas Auran, Terran
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Death Burst. When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of dust. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a CD 10 (Constituição) ou be blinded for 1 minute. A blinded creature can repeat the saving throw on each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Innate Spellcasting (1/Day). The mephit can innately cast sleep, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

Ações

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 4 (1d4 + 2) de dano cortante.

Blinding Breath (Recarrega 6). The mephit exhales a cone de 4,5 metros of blinding dust. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 10 (Destreza) or be blinded for 1 minute. Uma criatura pode repetir o teste de resistência no final de cada um dos turnos dela, terminando o efeito sobre si, caso obtenha sucesso.

Earth Glide. The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

Siege Monster. The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. O elemental realiza dois ataques de pancada.

An earth elemental plods forward like a walking hill, club-like arms of jagged stone swinging at its sides. Its head and body consist of dirt and stone, occasionally set with chunks of metal, gems, and bright minerals.

Elemental Demise. If the efreeti dies, its body disintegrates in a flash of fire and puff of smoke, leaving behind only equipment the efreeti was wearing or carrying.

Innate Spellcasting. The efreeti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect magic

Hurl Flame. Ranged Spell Attack: +7 para atingir, distância 16 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 17 (5d6) de dano de fogo.

Trampling Charge. If the elephant moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a CD 12 (Força) para não cair no chão. If the target is caído, the elephant can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

[ Érinye ]
Medium fiend (devil), Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 18 (plate)
Pontos de Vida 153 (18d8 + 72)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 18 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
16 (+3)
CON
18 (+4)
INT
14 (+2)
SAB
14 (+2)
CAR
18 (+4)
Testes de Resistência Des +7, Con +8, Sab +6, Car +8
Resistência a Dano frio; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos that aren't silvered
Imunidade a Dano fogo, veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão verdadeira 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas Infernal, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 12 (8400 XP)

Hellish Weapons. The erinyes's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 13 (3d8) poison damage on a hit (included in the attacks).

Resistência à Magia. The erinyes has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The erinyes makes three attacks.

Espada Longa. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +8 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, ou 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 (3d8) de dano de veneno.

Longbow. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +7 para atingir, distância 150/600 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d8 + 3) de dano perfurante mais 13 (3d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a CD 14 (Constituição) ou be envenenado. The poison lasts until it is removed by the lesser restoration spell or similar magic.

REACTIONS

Parry. The erinyes adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the erinyes must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

[ Ettercap ]
Medium monstrosity, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 13 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 44 (8d8 + 8)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Escalada 9 mt.
FOR
14 (+2)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
13 (+1)
INT
7 (-2)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
8 (-1)
Perícias Percepção +3, Furtividade +4, Survival +3
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Spider Climb. The ettercap can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Web Sense. While in contact with a web, the ettercap knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

Web Walker. The ettercap ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The ettercap makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 6 (1d8 + 2) de dano perfurante mais 4 (1d8) poison damage. The target must succeed on a CD 11 (Constituição) ou be envenenado for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (2d4 + 2) de dano cortante.

Web (Recarrega 5–6). Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, distância 30/18 mt., one Large or smaller creature. Acerto: The creature is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained creature can make a CD 11 Strength check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 10, 5 Pontos de Vida, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to concussão, veneno, and psychic damage.

Two Heads. The ettin has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, enfeitiçado, deafened, amedrontado, stunned and knocked unconscious.

Wakeful. When one of the ettin's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

[ Élémentaire du feu ]
Elemental Grande, Neutro
Classe de Armadura 13
Pontos de Vida 102 (12d10 + 36)
Deslocamento 15 mt.
FOR
10 (+0)
DES
17 (+3)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
6 (-2)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
7 (-2)
Resistência a Dano concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano fogo, veneno
Imunidade a Condição exausto, agarrado, paralisado, petrificado, envenenado, caído, impedido, inconsciente
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Ignan
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Fire Form. The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

Illumination. The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 feet.

Water Susceptibility. For every 5 feet the elemental moves in water, ou for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 de dano de frio.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The elemental makes two touch attacks.

Touch. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (2d6 + 3) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

A faint humanoid shape shows in a fire elemental's capricious devastation. Wherever it moves, it sets its surroundings ablaze, turning the world to ash, smoke, and cinders.
[ Géant du feu ]
Huge giant, Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 18 (plate)
Pontos de Vida 162 (13d12 + 78)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
25 (+7)
DES

Idiomas Giant
Nível de Desafio 9 (5000 XP)
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The giant makes two greatsword attacks.

Greatsword. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +11 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 28 (6d6 + 7) de dano cortante.

Rock. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +11 para atingir, distância 60/212 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 29 (4d10 + 7) de dano de concussão.

With dark skin and flaming red hair, fogo giants have a fearsome reputation as soldiers and conquerors. They dwell among volcanoes, lava flows, and rocky mountains, and are known for their ability to burn, plunder, and destroy.

Idiomas understands Ignan but can't speak
Nível de Desafio 1 (200 XP)

Heated Body. A creature that touches the snake or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) de dano de fogo.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The snake makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 3 (1d4 + 1) de dano perfurante mais 3 (1d6) de dano de fogo.
