[ Crânefeu ]
Tiny undead, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 13
Pontos de Vida 40 (9d4 + 18)
Deslocamento 0 mt., Voo 12 mt. (planar)
FOR
1 (-5)
DES
17 (+3)
CON
14 (+2)
INT
16 (+3)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
11 (+0)
Perícias Arcana +5, Percepção +2
Resistência a Dano elétrico, necrotic, piercing
Imunidade a Dano frio, fogo, veneno
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, amedrontado, paralisado, envenenado, prone
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas Comum
Nível de Desafio 4 (1100 XP)

Illumination. The flameskull sheds either dim light in a 15-foot radius, ou bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. It can switch between the options as an action.

Resistência à Magia. The flameskull has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Rejuvenation. If the flameskull is destroyed, it regains all its Pontos de Vida in 1 hour unless holy water is sprinkled on its remains or a dispel magic or remove curse spell is cast on them.

Conjuração. The flameskull is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save CD 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It requires no somatic or material components to cast its spells. The flameskull has the following wizard spells prepared:

Cantrip (at will): mage hand
1° nível (3 espaços): magic missile, shield
2° nível (2 espaços): blur, flaming sphere
3° nível (1 espaço): fireball
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The flameskull uses Fire Ray twice.

Fire Ray. Ranged Spell Attack: +5 para atingir, distância 9 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (3d6) de dano de fogo.

Blazing green flames and mad, echoing laughter surround an undead flameskull. This disembodied skull blasts foes with fiery rays from its eyes and dreadful spells called up from the dark recesses of its memory.
[ Golem de chair ]
Medium construct, Neutro
Classe de Armadura 9
Pontos de Vida 93 (11d8 + 44)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
19 (+4)
DES
9 (-1)
CON
18 (+4)
INT
6 (-2)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
5 (-3)
Imunidade a Dano elétrico, veneno; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos que não sejam de adamante
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, exausto, amedrontado, paralisado, petrificado, envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas understands the Idiomas of its creator but can't speak
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Fúria. Whenever the golem starts its turn with 40 Pontos de Vida or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its Pontos de Vida. The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk golem, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The golem must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a CD 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 Pontos de Vida or fewer, the golem might go berserk again.

Aversion of Fire. If the golem takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

Immutable Form. The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Lightning Absorption. Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of Pontos de Vida equal to the lightning damage dealt.

Resistência à Magia. The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Armas Mágicas. The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The golem makes two slam attacks.

Pancada. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 13 (2d8 + 4) de dano de concussão.

A flesh golem is a grisly assortment of humanoid body parts stitched and bolted together into a muscled brute imbued with formidable strength. Powerful enchantments protect it, deflecting spells and all but the most potent weapons.

[ Galeb duhr ]
Medium elemental, Neutro
Classe de Armadura 16 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 85 (9d8 + 45)
Deslocamento 4.5 mt. (9 mt. when rolling, 18 mt. rolling downhill)

20 (+5)

Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., tremorsense 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas Terran
Nível de Desafio 6 (2300 XP)

False Appearance. While the galeb duhr remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal boulder.

Rolling Charge. If the galeb duhr rolls at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) de dano de concussão. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 16 (Força) para não cair no chão.

Ações

Pancada. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +8 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 12 (2d6 + 5) de dano de concussão.

Animate. Boulders (1/Day). The galeb duhr magically animates up to two boulders it can see within 60 feet of it. A boulder has statistics like those of a galeb duhr, except it has Intelligence 1 and Charisma 1, it can't be charmed or frightened, and it lacks this action option. A boulder remains animated as long as the galeb duhr maintains concentration, up to 1 minute (as if concentrating on a spell).

[ Cube gélatineux ]
Large ooze, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 6
Pontos de Vida 84 (8d10 + 40)
Deslocamento 4.5 mt.
FOR
14 (+2)
DES
3 (-4)
CON
20 (+5)
INT
1 (-5)
SAB
6 (-2)
CAR
1 (-5)
Imunidade a Condição blinded, enfeitiçado, deafened, exausto, amedrontado, prone
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 18 mt. (blind beyond this radius), Percepção Passiva 8
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Ooze Cube. The cube takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the cube's Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw. Creatures inside the cube can be seen but have total cover. A creature within 5 feet of the cube can take an action to pull a creature or object out of the cube. Doing so requires a successful CD 12 Strength check, and the creature making the attempt takes 10 (3d6) acid damage. The cube can hold only one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures inside it at a time.

Transparent. Even when the cube is in plain sight, it takes a successful CD 15 Wisdom (Percepção) check to spot a cube that has neither moved nor attacked. A creature that tries to enter the cube's space while unaware of the cube is surprised by the cube.

Ações

Pseudopod. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 10 (3d6) de dano de ácido.

Engulf. The cube moves up to its Deslocamento. While doing so, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. Whenever the cube enters a creature's space, the creature must make a CD 12 (Destreza). On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the cube. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw. On a failed save, the cube enters the creature's space, and the creature takes 10 (3d6) acid damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can't breathe, is impedido, and takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the cube's turns. When the cube moves, the engulfed creature moves with it. An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a CD 12 Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the cube.

[ Blême ]
Medium undead, Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 13
Pontos de Vida 36 (8d8)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
17 (+3)
CON
10 (+0)
INT
11 (+0)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
8 (-1)
Resistência a Dano necrótico
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, exausto, envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Comum
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Stench. Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ghast must succeed on a CD 10 (Constituição) ou be envenenado until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the ghast's Stench for 24 hours.

Turning Defiance. The ghast and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 12 (2d8 + 3) de dano perfurante.

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a CD 10 (Constituição) ou ficará paralisada por 1 minuto. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

[ Fantôme ]
Medium undead, qualquer tendência
Classe de Armadura 11
Pontos de Vida 45 (10d8)
Deslocamento 0 mt., Voo 12 mt. (planar)
FOR
7 (-2)
DES
13 (+1)
CON
10 (+0)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
17 (+3)
Resistência a Dano ácido, fogo, lightning, trovejante; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano frio, necrotic, veneno
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, exausto, amedrontado, agarrado, paralisado, petrificado, envenenado, caído, restrained
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas the Idiomas it knew in life
Nível de Desafio 4 (1100 XP)

Ethereal Sight. The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

Incorporeal Movement. The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Ações

Withering Touch. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage.

Etherealness. The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, ou vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

Horrifying Visage. Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the ghost that can see it must succeed on a CD 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages 1d4 x 10 years. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this ghost's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed with a greater restoration spell, but only within 24 hours of it occurring.

Possession (Recarrega 6). One humanoid that the ghost can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a CD 13 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the ghost; the ghost then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The ghost can't be targeted by any attack, spell, ou other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, ou proficiencies. The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 Pontos de Vida, the ghost ends it as a bonus action, ou the ghost is turned or forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the ghost reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

A ghost is the soul of a once-living creature, bound to haunt a location, creature, ou object from its life.

Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Charge. If the boar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) slashing damage. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 13 (Força) para não cair no chão.

Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest). If the boar takes 10 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 Pontos de Vida, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

Ações

Tusk. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (2d6 + 3) de dano cortante.

The majestic giant elk is rare to the point that its appearance is often taken as a foreshadowing of an important event, such as the birth of a king. Legends tell of gods that take the form of giant elk when visiting the Material Plane. Many cultures therefore believe that to hunt these creatures is to invite divine wrath.

[ Grenouille géante ]

Sentidos Visão no escuro 9 mt., Percepção Passiva 12

Nível de Desafio 1/4 (50 XP)

Anfíbio. The frog can breathe air and water.

Standing Leap. The frog's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 3 metros, with or without a running start.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape CD 11). Until this grapple ends, the target is impedido, and the frog can't bite another target.

Swallow. The frog makes one bite attack against a Small or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and impedido, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 5 (2d4) acid damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

Hold Breath. While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

Underwater Camouflage. The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

Water Breathing. The octopus can breathe only underwater.

Ações

Tentacles. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 4.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (2d6 + 3) de dano de concussão. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape CD 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is impedido, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest). A 20-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 1 (200 XP)

Spider Climb. The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Web Sense. While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

Web Walker. The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a CD 11 (Constituição), sofrendo 9 (2d8) de dano de veneno se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 Pontos de Vida, the target is stable but envenenado for 1 hour, even after regaining Pontos de Vida, and is paralyzed while envenenado in this way.

Web (Recarrega 5–6). Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +5 para atingir, distância 30/18 mt., one creature. Acerto: The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a CD 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to concussão, veneno, and psychic damage).

To snare its prey, a giant spider spins elaborate webs or shoots sticky strands of webbing from its abdomen. Giant spiders are most commonly found underground, making their lairs on ceilings or in dark, web-filled crevices. Such lairs are often festooned with web cocoons holding past victims.

Sentidos Percepção às cegas 3 mt., Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 1/4 (50 XP)

Spider Climb. The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Web Sense. While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

Web Walker. The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must make a CD 11 (Constituição), sofrendo 7 (2d6) de dano de veneno se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 Pontos de Vida, the target is stable but envenenado for 1 hour, even after regaining Pontos de Vida, and is paralyzed while envenenado in this way.

Giant wolf spiders hunt prey across open ground or hide in burrows or crevices to attack from ambush.
[ Babélien ]
Medium aberration, Neutro
Classe de Armadura 9
Pontos de Vida 67 (9d8 + 27)
Deslocamento 3 mt., Natação 3 mt.
FOR
10 (+0)
DES
8 (-1)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
3 (-4)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
6 (-2)
Imunidade a Condição caído
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Aberrant Ground. The ground in a 10-foot radius around the mouther is doughlike difficult terrain. Each creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a CD 10 Strength saving throw or have its Deslocamento reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.


Gibbering. The mouther babbles incoherently while it can see any creature and isn't incapacitated. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the mouther and can hear the gibbering must succeed on a CD 10 (Sabedoria). On a failure, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a d8 to determine what it does during its turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action or bonus action and uses all its movement to move in a randomly determined direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The gibbering mouther makes one bite attack and, if it can, uses its Blinding Spittle.

Bites. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +2 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 17 (5d6) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a CD 10 (Força) para não cair no chão. If the target is killed by this damage, it is absorbed into the mouther.

Blinding Spittle (Recarrega 5–6). The mouther spits a chemical glob at a point it can see within 15 feet of it. The glob explodes in a blinding flash of light on impact. Each creature within 5 feet of the flash must succeed on a CD 13 (Destreza) or be blinded until the end of the mouther's next turn.

[ Glabrezu ]
Large fiend (demônio), Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 17 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 157 (15d10 + 75)
Deslocamento 12 mt.
FOR
20 (+5)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
21 (+5)
INT
19 (+4)
SAB
17 (+3)
CAR
16 (+3)
Testes de Resistência For +9, Con +9, Sab +7, Car +7
Resistência a Dano frio, fogo, lightning; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão verdadeira 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas Abyssal, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 9 (5000 XP)

Innate Spellcasting. The glabrezu's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save CD 16). The glabrezu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic
1/day each: confusion, fly, power word stun

Resistência à Magia. The glabrezu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The glabrezu makes four attacks: two with its pincers and two with its fists. Alternatively, it makes two attacks with its pincers and casts one spell.

Pincer. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +9 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 16 (2d10 + 5) de dano de concussão. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape CD 15). The glabrezu has two pincers, each of which can grapple only one target.

Fist. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +9 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (2d4 + 2) de dano de concussão.

[ Gladiateur ]
Humanóide Médio (qualquer raça), qualquer tendência
Classe de Armadura 16 (studded leather, shield)
Pontos de Vida 112 (15d8 + 45)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
15 (+2)
Testes de Resistência For +7, Des +5, Con +6
Perícias Athletics +10, Intimidation +5
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas um idioma qualquer (geralmente Comum)
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Brave. The gladiator has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Brute. A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gladiator hits with it (included in the attack).

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The gladiator makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

Spear. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. and range 20/18 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, ou 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Shield Bash. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 9 (2d4 + 4) de dano de concussão. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a CD 15 (Força) para não cair no chão.

REACTIONS

Parry. The gladiator adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the gladiator must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Gladiators battle for the entertainment of raucous crowds. Some gladiators are brutal pit fighters who treat each match as a life-or-death struggle, while others are professional duelists who command huge fees but rarely fight to the death.

Rampage. When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 Pontos de Vida with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its Deslocamento and make a bite attack.

Ações

Spear. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 20/18 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, ou 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Longbow. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +3 para atingir, distância 150/600 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d8 + 1) de dano perfurante.

Gnolls are feral, hyena-headed humanoids that attack without warning, slaughtering their victims and devouring their flesh.

Rampage. When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 Pontos de Vida with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its Deslocamento and make a bite attack.

Incite Rampage (Recarrega 5–6). One creature the gnoll can see within 30 feet of it can use its reaction to make a melee attack if it can hear the gnoll and has the Rampage trait.

Charge. If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) de dano de concussão. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 10 (Força) para não cair no chão.

Sure-Footed. The goat has advantage on Strength and (Destreza)s made against effects that would knock it prone.

Ações

Ram. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 3 (1d4 + 1) de dano de concussão.

[ Dragon d'or, nouveau-né ]
Dragão Médio, leal e Bom
Classe de Armadura 17 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 60 (8d8 + 24)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 18 mt., Natação 9 mt.
FOR
19 (+4)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
17 (+3)
INT
14 (+2)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
16 (+3)
Testes de Resistência Des +4, Con +5, Sab +2, Car +5
Perícias Percepção +4, Furtividade +4
Imunidade a Dano fogo
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 3 mt., Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Dracônico
Nível de Desafio 3 (700 XP)

Anfíbio. O dragão pode respirar ar e água.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 9 (1d10 + 4) de dano perfurante.

Arma de Sopro (Recarrega 5–6). O dragão usa um dos seguintes tipos de armas de sopro.

Sopro Flamejante. O dragão expele fogo num cone de 4,5 metros. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 13 (Destreza), sofrendo 22 (4d10) de dano de fogo se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

Weakening Breath. O dragão expele gás num cone de 4,5 metros. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 13 (Força) ou terá desvantagem em jogadas de ataque baseadas em Força, testes de Força e testes de resistência de Força por 1 minuto. Uma criatura pode repetir o teste de resistência no final de cada um dos turnos dela, terminando o efeito sobre si, caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Gorgone ]
Large monstrosity, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 19 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 114 (12d10 + 48)
Deslocamento 12 mt.
FOR
20 (+5)
DES
11 (+0)
CON
18 (+4)
INT
2 (-4)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
7 (-2)
Perícias Percepção +4
Imunidade a Condição petrified
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Trampling Charge. If the gorgon moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a CD 16 (Força) para não cair no chão. If the target is caído, the gorgon can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

Ações

Gore. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +8 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 18 (2d12 + 5) de dano perfurante.

Hooves. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +8 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 16 (2d10 + 5) de dano de concussão.

Petrifying Breath (Recarrega 5–6). The gorgon exhales petrifying gas in a cone de 9 metros. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 13 (Constituição). On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

[ Vase grise ]
Medium ooze, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 8
Pontos de Vida 22 (3d8 + 9)
Deslocamento 3 mt., Escalada 3 mt.
FOR
12 (+1)
DES
6 (-2)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
1 (-5)
SAB
6 (-2)
CAR
2 (-4)
Perícias Furtividade +2
Resistência a Dano ácido, frio, fogo
Imunidade a Condição blinded, enfeitiçado, deafened, exausto, amedrontado, prone
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 18 mt. (blind beyond this radius), Percepção Passiva 8
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Amorphous. The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

Corrode Metal. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the ooze corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the ooze is destroyed after dealing damage.

The ooze can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal in 1 round.

False Appearance. While the ooze remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an oily pool or wet rock.

Ações

Pseudopod. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d6 + 1) de dano de concussão plus 7 (2d6) acid damage, and if the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

Sopro Venenoso (Recarrega 5–6). O dragão pode expelir gás venenoso em um cone de 4,5 metros. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 11 (Constituição), sofrendo 21 (6d6) de dano de veneno se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Guenaude verte ]
Medium fey, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 17 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 82 (11d8 + 33)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
13 (+1)
SAB
14 (+2)
CAR
14 (+2)
Perícias Arcana +3, Enganação +4, Percepção +4, Furtividade +3
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Comum, Dracônico, Sylvan
Nível de Desafio 3 (700 XP)

Anfíbio. The hag can breathe air and water.

Innate Spellcasting. The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 12). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: dancing lights, minor illusion, vicious mockery

Mimicry. The hag can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful CD 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

Ações

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 13 (2d8 + 4) de dano cortante.

Illusory Appearance. The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The illusion ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies. The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching her would feel her rough flesh. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a CD 20 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

Invisible Passage. The hag magically turns invisible until she attacks or casts a spell, ou until her concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). While invisible, she leaves no physical evidence of her passage, so she can be tracked only by magic. Any equipment she wears or carries is invisible with her.

Pontos de Vida 127 (15d10 + 45)
Deslocamento 9 mt.

CAR
9 (-1)
Perícias Percepção +4, Furtividade +6
Imunidade a Dano elétrico
Imunidade a Condição blinded, prone
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 18 mt. (blind beyond this radius), Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Grell
Nível de Desafio 3 (700 XP)
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The grell makes two attacks: one with its tentacles and one with its beak.

Tentacles. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., one creature. Acerto: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a CD 11 (Constituição) ou be envenenado for 1 minute. The envenenado target is paralyzed, and it can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

The target is also grappled (escape CD 15). If the target is Medium or smaller, it is also restrained until this grapple ends. While grappling the target, the grell has advantage on attack rolls against it and can't use this attack against other targets. When the grell moves, any Medium or smaller target it is grappling moves with it.

Beak. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (2d4 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Beak. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) de dano perfurante.

This wormlike monstrosity blends in with the rock of the caverns it haunts. When prey comes near, its barbed tentacles unfurl to reveal its hungry, snapping beak.

Blind Sentidos. The grimlock can't use its Percepção às cegas while deafened and unable to smell.

Keen Hearing and Smell. The grimlock has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

Stone Camouflage. The grimlock has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

Ações

Spear. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 20/18 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, ou 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Guards include members of a city watch, sentries in a citadel or fortified town, and the bodyguards of merchants and nobles.
[ Naga gardien ]
Large monstrosity, leal e Bom
Classe de Armadura 18 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 127 (15d10 + 45)
Deslocamento 12 mt.
FOR
19 (+4)
DES
18 (+4)

CAR
18 (+4)
Testes de Resistência Des +8, Con +7, Int +7, Sab +8, Car +8
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Celestial, Common
Nível de Desafio 10 (5900 XP)

Rejuvenation. If it dies, the naga returns to life in 1d6 days and regains all its Pontos de Vida. Only a wish spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

Conjuração. The naga is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save CD 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks), and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. It has the following cleric spells prepared:

Truques (à vontade): mending, chama sagrada, taumaturgia
1° nível (4 espaços): command, curar ferimentos, shield of faith
2° nível (3 espaços): calm emotions, hold person
3° nível (3 espaços): bestow curse, clairvoyance
4° nível (3 espaços): banishment, freedom of movement
5° nível (2 espaços): flame strike, geas
6° nível (1 espaço): true seeing
Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +8 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., one creature. Acerto: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a CD 15 (Constituição), sofrendo 45 (10d8) de dano de veneno se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

Spit Poison. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +8 para atingir, distância 15/9 mt., one creature. Acerto: The target must make a CD 15 (Constituição), sofrendo 45 (10d8) de dano de veneno se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Gynosphinx ]
Large monstrosity, leal e Neutro
Classe de Armadura 17 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 136 (16d10 + 48)
Deslocamento 12 mt., Voo 18 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
18 (+4)
SAB
18 (+4)
CAR
18 (+4)
Perícias Arcana +12, História +12, Percepção +8, Religião +8
Resistência a Dano concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano psychic
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, amedrontado
Sentidos Visão verdadeira 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 18
Idiomas Comum, Sphinx
Nível de Desafio 11 (7200 XP)

Inscrutable. The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

Armas Mágicas. The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

Conjuração. The sphinx is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save CD 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It requires no material components to cast its spells. The sphinx has the following wizard spells prepared:

Truques (à vontade): mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation
1° nível (4 espaços): detect magic, identify, shield
2° nível (3 espaços): darkness, locate object, suggestion
3° nível (3 espaços): dispel magic, remove curse, tongues
4° nível (3 espaços): banishment, greater invisibility
5° nível (1 espaço): legend lore
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The sphinx makes two claw attacks.

Garra. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +8 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 13 (2d8 + 4) de dano cortante.

AÇÕES LENDÁRIAS

The sphinx can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The sphinx regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Claw Attack. The sphinx makes one claw attack.

Teleport (Custa 2 Ações). The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Cast a Spell (Custa 3 Ações). The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

Fire. Breath (Recharge. 5-6). The veteran exhales fire in a cone de 4,5 metros. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 15 (Destreza), sofrendo 24 (7d6) de dano de fogo se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Harpie ]
Medium monstrosity, Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 11
Pontos de Vida 38 (7d8 + 7)
Deslocamento 6 mt., Voo 12 mt.
FOR
12 (+1)
DES
13 (+1)
CON
12 (+1)
INT
7 (-2)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
13 (+1)
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Comum
Nível de Desafio 1 (200 XP)
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The harpy makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its club.

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (2d4 + 1) de dano cortante.

Clava. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 3 (1d4 + 1) de dano de concussão.

Luring Song. The harpy sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the harpy that can hear the song must succeed on a CD 11 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the song ends. The harpy must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the harpy is incapacitated. While charmed by the harpy, a target is incapacitated and ignores the songs of other harpies. If the charmed target is more than 5 feet away from the harpy, the target must move on its turn toward the harpy by the most direct route. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the harpy, a target can repeat the saving throw. A creature can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it. A target that successfully saves is immune to this harpy's song for the next 24 hours.

A harpy combines the body, legs, and wings of a vulture with the torso, arms, and head of a human female. Its sweet song has lured countless adventurers to their deaths.

Stench. Any creature that starts its turn within 3 metros of the hezrou must succeed on a CD 14 (Constituição) ou be envenenado until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the hezrou's stench for 24 hours.

Idiomas Comum, Goblin
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Martial Advantage. Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't incapacitated.

Ações

Espada Longa. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, ou 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Hobgoblins are large goblinoids with dark-orange or red-orange skin. A hobgoblin measures virtue by physical strength and martial prowess, caring about nothing except skill and cunning in battle.
[ Hobgobelin, capitaine ]
Humanóide Médio (goblinoid), Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 17 (half plate)
Pontos de Vida 39 (6d8 + 12)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
15 (+2)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
14 (+2)
INT
12 (+1)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
13 (+1)
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Comum, Goblin
Nível de Desafio 3 (700 XP)

Martial Advantage. Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 10 (3d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't incapacitated.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The hobgoblin makes two greatsword attacks.

Greatsword. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 9 (2d6 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Javelin. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 30/16 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest). For 1 minute, the hobgoblin can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the hobgoblin. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the hobgoblin is incapacitated.

FOR
4 (-3)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
11 (+0)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
7 (-2)
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas understands the Idiomas of its creator but can't speak
Nível de Desafio 0 (10 XP)

Telepathic Bond. While the homunculus is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it Sentidos to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a CD 10 (Constituição) ou be envenenado for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is instead envenenado for 5 (1d10) minutes and unconscious while envenenado in this way.

[ Diable cornu ]
Large fiend (devil), Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 18 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 178 (17d10 + 85)
Deslocamento 6 mt., Voo 18 mt.
FOR
22 (+6)
DES
17 (+3)
CON
21 (+5)
INT
12 (+1)
SAB
16 (+3)
CAR
17 (+3)
Testes de Resistência For +10, Des +7, Sab +7, Car +7
Resistência a Dano frio; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos not made with silvered weapons
Imunidade a Dano fogo, veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas Infernal, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 11 (7200 XP)

Devil's Sight. Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's Visão no escuro.

Resistência à Magia. The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The devil makes three melee attacks: two with its fork and one with its tail. It can use Hurl Flame in place of any melee attack.

Fork. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +10 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 15 (2d8 + 6) de dano perfurante.

Cauda. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +10 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a CD 17 (Constituição) ou lose 10 (3d6) Pontos de Vida at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 10 (3d6). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful CD 12 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

Hurl Flame. Ranged Spell Attack: +7 para atingir, distância 115 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 14 (4d6) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

Blood Frenzy. The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its Pontos de Vida.

Water Breathing. The shark can breathe only underwater.

A hunter shark is 15 to 20 feet long, and usually hunts alone in deep waters.
[ Hydre ]
Monstruosidade Enorme, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 15 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 172 (15d12 + 75)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Natação 9 mt.
FOR
20 (+5)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
20 (+5)
INT
2 (-4)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
7 (-2)
Perícias Percepção +6
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 16
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 8 (3900 XP)

Hold Breath. The hydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

Multiple Heads. The hydra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the hydra has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, enfeitiçado, deafened, amedrontado, stunned, and knocked unconscious. Whenever the hydra takes 25 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hydra dies. At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The hydra regains 10 Pontos de Vida for each head regrown in this way.

Reactive Heads. For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

Wakeful. While the hydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The hydra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +8 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (1d10 + 5) de dano perfurante.

The hydra is a reptilian horror with a crocodilian body and multiple heads on long, serpentine necks. Although its heads can be severed, the hydra magically regrows them in short order.

[ Diable gelé ]
Large fiend (devil), Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 18 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 180 (19d10 + 76)
Deslocamento 12 mt.
FOR
21 (+5)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
18 (+4)
INT
18 (+4)
SAB
15 (+2)
CAR
18 (+4)
Testes de Resistência Des +7, Con +9, Sab +7, Car +9
Resistência a Dano concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos that aren't silvered
Imunidade a Dano frio, fogo, veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 18 mt., Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas Infernal, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 14 (11500 XP)

Devil's Sight. Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's Visão no escuro.

Resistência à Magia. The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The devil makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its tail.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +10 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 12 (2d6 + 5) de dano perfurante mais 10 (3d6) de dano de frio.

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +10 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) de dano de frio.

Cauda. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +10 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 12 (2d6 + 5) de dano de concussão plus 10 (3d6) de dano de frio.

Wall of Ice (Recarrega 6). The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 3 metros high, ou it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter. When the wall appears, each creature in its space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on, unless the creature is incapacitated. The creature then makes a CD 17 (Destreza), sofrendo 35 (10d6) de dano de frio se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso. The wall lasts for 1 minute or until the devil is incapacitated or dies. The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-foot section has AC 5, 30 Pontos de Vida, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to acid, frio, necrotic, veneno, and psychic damage. If a section is destroyed, it leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the wall occupied. Whenever a creature finishes moving through the frigid air on a turn, willingly or otherwise, the creature must make a CD 17 (Constituição), sofrendo 17 (5d6) de dano de frio se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso. The frigid air dissipates when the rest of the wall vanishes.

[ Méphite de glace ]
Small elemental, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 11
Pontos de Vida 21 (6d6)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 9 mt.
FOR
7 (-2)
DES
13 (+1)
CON
10 (+0)
INT
9 (-1)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
12 (+1)
Perícias Percepção +2, Furtividade +3
Damage vulnerabilities concussão, fogo
Imunidade a Dano frio, veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas Aquan, Auran
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Death Burst. When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of jagged ice. Each creature within 5 feet of it must make a CD 10 (Destreza), sofrendo 4 (1d8) slashing damage se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

False Appearance. While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary shard of ice.

Innate Spellcasting (1/Day). The mephit can innately cast fog cloud, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

Ações

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) de dano de frio.

Frost Breath (Recarrega 6). The mephit exhales a cone de 4,5 metros of cold air. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 10 (Destreza), sofrendo 5 (2d4) de dano de frio se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Diablotin ]
Tiny fiend (devil, shapechanger), Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 13
Pontos de Vida 10 (3d4 + 3)
Deslocamento 6 mt., Voo 12 mt.
FOR

12 (+1)

14 (+2)
Perícias Enganação +4, Intuição +3, Persuasão +4, Furtividade +5
Resistência a Dano frio; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos not made with silvered weapons
Imunidade a Dano fogo, veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas Infernal, Common
Nível de Desafio 1 (200 XP)

Shapechanger. The imp can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a rat (Deslocamento 6 mt.), a raven (6 mt., Voo 18 mt.), ou a spider (6 mt., Escalada 6 mt.), ou back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the Deslocamento changes noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Devil's Sight. Magical darkness doesn't impede the imp's Visão no escuro.

Resistência à Magia. The imp has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ações

Sting (Bite in Beast Form). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make on a CD 11 (Constituição), sofrendo 10 (3d6) de dano de veneno se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

Invisibility. The imp magically turns invisible until it attacks or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the imp wears or carries is invisible with it.

Pontos de Vida 210 (20d10 + 100)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR

DES

Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas understands the Idiomas of its creator but can't speak
Nível de Desafio 16 (15000 XP)

Fire Absorption. Whenever the golem is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of Pontos de Vida equal to the fire damage dealt.

Immutable Form. The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Resistência à Magia. The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Armas Mágicas. The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

Ações

Sopro Venenoso (Recarrega 6). The golem exhales poisonous gas in a cone de 4,5 metros. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 19 (Constituição), sofrendo 45 (10d8) de dano de veneno se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Chacalidé ]
Humanóide Médio (shapechanger), Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 18 (4d8)
Deslocamento 12 mt.
FOR
11 (+0)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
11 (+0)
INT
13 (+1)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
10 (+0)
Perícias Enganação +4, Percepção +2, Furtividade +4
Immunities concussão, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas Comum (can't speak in jackal form)
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Shapechanger. The jackalwere can use its action to polymorph into a specific Medium human or a jackal-humanoid hybrid, ou back into its true form (that of a Small jackal). Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Keen Hearing and Smell. The jackalwere has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

Pack Tactics. The jackalwere has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the jackalwere's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Actions

Bite (Jackal or Hybrid Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d4 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Scimitar (Human or Hybrid Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) de dano cortante.

Sleep Gaze. The jackalwere gazes at one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a CD 10 (Sabedoria). On a failed save, the target succumbs to a magical slumber, falling unconscious for 10 minutes or until someone uses an action to shake the target awake. A creature that successfully saves against the effect is immune to this jackalwere's gaze for the next 24 hours. Undead and creatures immune to being charmed aren't affected by it.

Idiomas understands Auran and Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait
Nível de Desafio 1/4 (50 XP)

Ambusher. In the first round of a combat, the kenku has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

Mimicry. The kenku can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful CD 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

Ações

Shortsword. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano perfurante.

[ Chevalier ]
Humanóide Médio (qualquer raça), qualquer tendência
Classe de Armadura 18 (plate)
Pontos de Vida 52 (8d8 + 16)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
11 (+0)
CON
14 (+2)
INT
11 (+0)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
15 (+2)
Testes de Resistência Con +4, Sab +2
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas um idioma qualquer (geralmente Comum)
Nível de Desafio 3 (700 XP)

Brave. The knight has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The knight makes two melee attacks.

Greatsword. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (2d6 + 3) de dano cortante.

Heavy Crossbow. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +2 para atingir, distância 100/400 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d10) de dano perfurante.

Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest). For 1 minute, the knight can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the knight is incapacitated.

REACTIONS

Parry. The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Knights are warriors who pledge service to rulers, religious orders, and noble causes. A knight's alignment determines the extent to which a pledge is honored. Whether undertaking a quest or patrolling a realm, a knight often travels with an entourage that includes squires and hirelings who are commoners.
[ Kobold ]
Small humanoid (kobold), Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 5 (2d6 - 2)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
7 (-2)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
9 (-1)
INT
8 (-1)
SAB
7 (-2)
CAR
8 (-1)
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 8
Idiomas Comum, Dracônico
Nível de Desafio 1/8 (25 XP)

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Pack Tactics. The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Ações

Dagger. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d4 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Sling. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, distância 30/16 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d4 + 2) de dano de concussão.

Kobolds are craven reptilian humanoids that commonly infest dungeons. They make up for their physical ineptitude with a cleverness for trap making.
[ Kraken ]
Gargantuan monstrosity (titan), Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 18 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 472 (27d20 + 189)
Deslocamento 6 mt., Natação 18 mt.
FOR
30 (+10)
DES
11 (+0)
CON
25 (+7)
INT
22 (+6)
SAB
18 (+4)
CAR
20 (+5)
Testes de Resistência For +17, Des +7, Con +14, Int +13, Sab +11
Imunidade a Dano elétrico; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Condição amedrontado, paralisado
Sentidos Visão verdadeira 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas understands Abyssal, Celestial, Infernal, and Primordial but can't speak, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 23 (50000 XP)

Anfíbio. The kraken can breathe air and water.

Freedom of Movement. The kraken ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its Deslocamento or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

Siege Monster. The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The kraken makes three tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +17 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 23 (3d8 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature grappled by the kraken, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and impedido, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes 42 (12d6) acid damage at the start of each of the kraken's turns. If the kraken takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken must succeed on a CD 25 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 3 metros of the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

Tentáculo. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +17 para atingir, alcance 9 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 20 (3d6 + 10) de dano de concussão, and the target is grappled (escape CD 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

Fling. One Large or smaller object held or creature grappled by the kraken is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 (1d6) de dano de concussão para cada 3 metros que ele percorreu. Se o alvo for arremessado em outra criatura, a criatura deve ser bem sucedida num teste de CD 18 (Destreza) ou sofrerá a mesma quantidade de dano e cairá no chão.

Lightning Storm. The kraken magically creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target the kraken can see within 120 feet of it. A target must make a CD 23 (Destreza), sofrendo 22 (4d10) lightning damage se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

AÇÕES LENDÁRIAS

The kraken can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The kraken regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Tentacle Attack or Fling. The kraken makes one tentacle attack or uses its Fling.

Lightning Storm (Custa 2 Ações). The kraken uses Lightning Storm.

Ink Cloud (Custa 3 Ações). While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 60-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken. Each creature other than the kraken that ends its turn there must succeed on a CD 23 (Constituição), sofrendo 16 (3d10) de dano de veneno se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kraken's next turn.

[ Kuo-toa ]
Humanóide Médio (kuo-toa), Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 13 (armadura natural, shield)
Pontos de Vida 18 (4d8)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Natação 9 mt.
FOR
13 (+1)
DES
10 (+0)
CON
11 (+0)
INT
11 (+0)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
8 (-1)
Perícias Percepção +4
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Undercommon
Nível de Desafio 1/4 (50 XP)

Anfíbio. The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

Otherworldly Percepção. The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

Slippery. The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 3 (1d4 + 1) de dano perfurante.

Spear. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 20/18 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, ou 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Net. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +3 para atingir, distância 5/4.5 mt., one Large or smaller creature. Acerto: The target is restrained. A creature can use its action to make a CD 10 Strength check to free itself or another creature in a net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

REACTIONS

Sticky Shield. When a creature misses the kuo-toa with a melee weapon attack, the kuo-toa uses its sticky shield to catch the weapon. The attacker must succeed on a CD 11 Strength saving throw, ou the weapon becomes stuck to the kuo-toa's shield. If the weapon's wielder can't or won't let go of the weapon, the wielder is grappled while the weapon is stuck. While stuck, the weapon can't be used. A creature can pull the weapon free by taking an action to make a CD 11 Strength check and succeeding.

[ Kuo-toa, archiprêtre ]
Humanóide Médio (kuo-toa), Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 13 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 97 (13d8 + 39)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Natação 9 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
13 (+1)
SAB
16 (+3)
CAR
14 (+2)
Perícias Percepção +9, Religião +6
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 19
Idiomas Undercommon
Nível de Desafio 6 (2300 XP)

Anfíbio. The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

Otherworldly Percepção. The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

Slippery. The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Conjuração. The kuo-toa is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save CD 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:

Truques (à vontade): guidance, chama sagrada, taumaturgia
1° nível (4 espaços): detect magic, santuário, shield of faith
2° nível (3 espaços): hold person, spiritual weapon
3° nível (3 espaços): spirit guardians, tongues
4° nível (3 espaços): control water, divination
5° nível (2 espaços): mass curar ferimentos, scrying
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The kuo-toa makes two melee attacks.

Scepter. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano de concussão plus 14 (4d6) de dano elétrico.

Unarmed Strike. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d4 + 3) de dano de concussão.

[ Kuo-toa, fouet ]
Humanóide Médio (kuo-toa), Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 11 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 65 (10d8 + 20)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Natação 9 mt.
FOR
14 (+2)
DES
10 (+0)
CON
14 (+2)
INT
12 (+1)
SAB
14 (+2)
CAR
11 (+0)
Perícias Percepção +6, Religião +4
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 16
Idiomas Undercommon
Nível de Desafio 1 (200 XP)

Anfíbio. The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

Otherworldly Percepção. The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

Slippery. The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Conjuração. The kuo-toa is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save CD 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:

Truques (à vontade): chama sagrada, taumaturgia
1° nível (3 espaços): bane, shield of faith
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The kuo-toa makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its pincer staff.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d4 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Pincer Staff. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape CD 14). Until this grapple ends, the kuo-toa can't use its pincer staff on another target.

VARIANTE : KUO-TOA MONITOR

A kuo-toa monitor has a Nível de Desafio rating of 3 (700 XP). It has the same statistics as a kuo-toa whip except that it adds its Wisdom modifier to its Classe de Armadura (AC 13), loses the Spellcaster trait, and replaces the whip's action options with the following action options.

Ataques Múltiplos. The kuo-toa makes one bite attack and two unarmed strikes.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d4 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Unarmed Strike. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) de dano de concussão plus 3 (1d6) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the end of the kuo-toa's next turn.

[ Lamie ]
Large monstrosity, Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 13 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 97 (13d10 + 26)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
13 (+1)
CON
15 (+2)
INT
14 (+2)
SAB
15 (+2)
CAR
16 (+3)
Perícias Enganação +7, Intuição +4, Furtividade +3
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas Abyssal, Common
Nível de Desafio 4 (1100 XP)

Innate Spellcasting. The lamia's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

At will: disguise self (any humanoid form), major image
3/day each: charm person, mirror image, scrying, suggestion
1/day: geas
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The lamia makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its dagger or Intoxicating Touch.

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 14 (2d10 + 3) de dano cortante.

Dagger. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d4 + 3) de dano perfurante.

Intoxicating Touch. Melee Spell Attack: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: The target is magically cursed for 1 hour. Until the curse ends, the target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws and all ability checks.

[ Lémure ]
Medium fiend (devil), Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 7
Pontos de Vida 13 (3d8)
Deslocamento 4.5 mt.
FOR
10 (+0)
DES
5 (-3)
CON
11 (+0)
INT
1 (-5)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
3 (-4)
Resistência a Dano frio
Imunidade a Dano fogo, veneno
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, amedrontado, envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas understands Infernal but can't speak
Nível de Desafio 0 (10 XP)

Devil's Sight. Magical darkness doesn't impede the lemure's Visão no escuro.

Hellish Rejuvenation. A lemure that dies in the Nine Hells comes back to life with all its Pontos de Vida in 1d10 days unless it is killed by a good-aligned creature with a bênção spell cast on that creature or its remains are sprinkled with holy water.

Ações

Fist. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 2 (1d4) de dano de concussão.

[ Liche ]
Medium undead, any evil alignment
Classe de Armadura 17 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 135 (18d8 + 54)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
11 (+0)
DES
16 (+3)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
20 (+5)
SAB
14 (+2)
CAR
16 (+3)
Testes de Resistência Con +10, Int +12, Sab +9
Perícias Arcana +19, História +12, Intuição +9, Percepção +9
Resistência a Dano frio, lightning, necrotic
Imunidade a Dano veneno; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, exausto, amedrontado, paralisado, envenenado
Sentidos Visão verdadeira 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 19
Idiomas Comum plus up to five other Idiomas
Nível de Desafio 21 (33000 XP)

Resistência Lendária (3/Dia). If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Rejuvenation. If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all its Pontos de Vida and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

Conjuração. The lich is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save CD 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). The lich has the following wizard spells prepared:

Truques (à vontade): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost
1° nível (4 espaços): detect magic, magic missile, shield, thunderwave
2° nível (3 espaços): detect thoughts, invisibility, Melf's acid arrow, mirror image
3° nível (3 espaços): animate dead, counterspell, dispel magic, fireball
4° nível (3 espaços): bluz, dimension door
5° nível (3 espaços): cloudkill, scrying
6° nível (1 espaço): disintegrate, globe of invulnerability
7° nível (1 espaço): finger of death, plane shift
8° nível (1 espaço): dominate monster, power word stun
9° nível (1 espaço): power word kill

Turn Resistance. The lich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

Ações

Paralyzing Touch. Melee Spell Attack: +12 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 10 (3d6) cold damage. The target must succeed on a CD 18 (Constituição) ou ficará paralisada por 1 minuto. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

AÇÕES LENDÁRIAS

The lich can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The lich regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Cantrip. The lich casts a cantrip.

Paralyzing Touch (Custa 2 Ações). The lich uses its Paralyzing Touch.

Frightening Gaze (Custa 2 Ações). The lich fixes its gaze on one creature it can see within 3 metros of it. The target must succeed on a CD 18 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the lich's gaze for the next 24 hours.

Disrupt Life (Custa 3 Ações). Each non‐undead creature within 20 feet of the lich must make a CD 18 Constitution saving throw against this magic, sofrendo 21 (6d6) necrotic damage se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Lion ]
Besta Grande, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 26 (4d10 + 4)
Deslocamento 15 mt.
FOR
17 (+3)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
13 (+1)
INT
3 (-4)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
8 (-1)
Perícias Percepção +3, Furtividade +6
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 1 (200 XP)

Keen Smell. The lion has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on smell.

Pack Tactics. The lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Bote. If the lion moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a CD 13 (Força) para não cair no chão. If the target is caído, the lion can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

Running Leap. With a 10-foot running start, the lion can long jump up to 25 feet.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d8 + 3) de dano perfurante.

Garra. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano cortante.
