[ Roi/Reine lézard ]
Humanóide Médio (lizardfolk), Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 15 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 78 (12d8 + 24)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Natação 9 mt.
FOR
17 (+3)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
15 (+2)
INT
11 (+0)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
15 (+2)
Testes de Resistência Con +4, Sab +2
Perícias Percepção +4, Furtividade +5, Survival +4
Imunidade a Condição amedrontado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Abyssal, Dracônico
Nível de Desafio 4 (1100 XP)

Hold Breath. The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

Skewer. Once per turn, when the lizardfolk makes a melee attack with its trident and hits, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage, and the lizardfolk gains temporary Pontos de Vida equal to the extra damage dealt.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The lizardfolk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or trident or two melee attacks with its trident.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano perfurante.

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d4 + 3) de dano cortante.

Trident. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 20/18 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, ou 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

[ Homme-lézard ]
Humanóide Médio (lizardfolk), Neutro
Classe de Armadura 15 (armadura natural, shield)
Pontos de Vida 22 (4d8 + 4)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Natação 9 mt.
FOR
15 (+2)
DES
10 (+0)
CON
13 (+1)
INT
7 (-2)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
7 (-2)
Perícias Percepção +3, Furtividade +4, Survival +5
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas Dracônico
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Hold Breath. The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The lizardfolk makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Heavy Club. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) de dano de concussão.

Javelin. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 30/16 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Spiked Shield. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Lizardfolk are primitive reptilian humanoids that lurk in swamps and jungles. Fiercely territorial, they kill when it is expedient and do whatever it takes to survive.
[ Homme-lézard, chaman ]
Humanóide Médio (lizardfolk), Neutro
Classe de Armadura 13 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 27 (5d8 + 5)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Natação 9 mt.
FOR
15 (+2)
DES
10 (+0)
CON
13 (+1)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
15 (+2)
CAR
8 (-1)
Perícias Percepção +4, Furtividade +4, Survival +6
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Dracônico
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Hold Breath. The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

Spellcasting (Lizardfolk Form Only). The lizardfolk is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save CD 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The lizardfolk has the following druid spells prepared:

Truques (à vontade): druidcraft, produce flame, thorn whip
1st Level (4 espaços): entangle, fog cloud
2nd Level (3 espaços): heat metal, spike growth
3rd Level (2 espaços): conjure animals (reptiles only), plant growth
Ações

Multiattack (Lizardfolk Form Only). The lizardfolk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, ou 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage in crocodile form. If the lizardfolk is in crocodile form and the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target is grappled (escape CD 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is impedido, and the lizardfolk can't bite another target. If the lizardfolk reverts to its true form, the grapple ends.

Claws (Lizardfolk Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d4 + 2) de dano cortante.

Mudar Forma (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest). The lizardfolk magically polymorphs into a crocodile, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

[ Mage ]
Humanóide Médio (qualquer raça), qualquer tendência
Classe de Armadura 12 (15 with mage armor)
Pontos de Vida 40 (9d8)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
9 (-1)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
11 (+0)
INT
17 (+3)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
11 (+0)
Testes de Resistência Int +6, Sab +4
Perícias Arcana +6, História +6
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas any four Idiomas
Nível de Desafio 6 (2300 XP)

Conjuração. The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save CD 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

Truques (à vontade): fire bolt, luz, mage hand, prestidigitation
1° nível (4 espaços): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield
2° nível (3 espaços): misty step, suggestion
3° nível (3 espaços): counterspell, fireball, fly
4° nível (3 espaços): greater invisibility, ice storm
5° nível (1 espaço): cone of cold
Ações

Dagger. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 20/18 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d4 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Mages spend their lives in the study and practice of magic. Good-aligned mages offer counsel to nobles and others in power, while evil mages dwell in isolated sites to perform unspeakable experiments without interference.
[ Méphite de magma ]
Small elemental, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 11
Pontos de Vida 22 (5d6 + 5)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 9 mt.
FOR
8 (-1)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
12 (+1)
INT
7 (-2)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
10 (+0)
Perícias Furtividade +3
Damage vulnerabilities frio
Imunidade a Dano fogo, veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Ignan, Terran
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Death Burst. When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of lava. Each creature within 5 feet of it must make a CD 11 (Destreza), sofrendo 7 (2d6) de dano de fogo se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

False Appearance. While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary mound of magma.

Innate Spellcasting (1/Day). The mephit can innately cast heat metal (spell save CD 10), requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

Ações

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) de dano de fogo.

Sopro Flamejante (Recarrega 6). The mephit exhales a cone de 4,5 metros of fire. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 11 (Destreza), sofrendo 7 (2d6) de dano de fogo se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Magmatique ]
Small elemental, chaotic Neutro
Classe de Armadura 14 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 9 (2d6 + 2)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
7 (-2)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
12 (+1)
INT
8 (-1)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
10 (+0)
Resistência a Dano concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano fogo
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Ignan
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Death Burst. When the magmin dies, it explodes in a burst of fire and magma. Each creature within 3 metros of it must make a CD 11 (Destreza), sofrendo 7 (2d6) de dano de fogo se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso. Flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried in that area are ignited.

Ignited Illumination. As a bonus action, the magmin can set itself ablaze or extinguish its flames. While ablaze, the magmin sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 3 metros.

Ações

Touch. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (2d6) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 3 (1d6) fire damage at the end of each of its turns.

Trampling Charge. If the mammoth moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a CD 18 (Força) para não cair no chão. If the target is caído, the mammoth can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

Tail Spike Regrowth. The manticore has twenty-four tail spikes. Used spikes regrow when the manticore finishes a long rest.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The manticore makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws or three with its tail spikes.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d8 + 3) de dano perfurante.

A manticore has a vaguely humanoid head, the body of a lion, and the wings of a dragon. Its long tail ends in a cluster of deadly spikes that can impale prey at impressive range.

[ Marilith ]
Large fiend (demônio), Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 18 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 189 (18d10 + 90)
Deslocamento 12 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
20 (+5)
CON
20 (+5)
INT
18 (+4)
SAB
16 (+3)
CAR
20 (+5)
Testes de Resistência For +9, Con +10, Sab +8, Car +10
Resistência a Dano frio, fogo, lightning; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão verdadeira 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas Abyssal, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 16 (15000 XP)

Resistência à Magia. The marilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Armas Mágicas. The marilith's weapon attacks are magical.

Reactive. The marilith can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The marilith makes seven attacks: six with its longswords and one with its tail.

Espada Longa. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +9 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 13 (2d8 + 4) de dano cortante.

Cauda. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +9 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., one creature. Acerto: 15 (2d10 + 4) de dano de concussão. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape CD 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is impedido, the marilith can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the marilith can't make tail attacks against other targets.

Teletransporte. The marilith magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

REACTIONS

Parry. The marilith adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the marilith must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

[ Molosse ]

FOR
13 (+1)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
12 (+1)

Sentidos Percepção Passiva 13

Keen Hearing and Smell. The mastiff has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 11 (Força) para não cair no chão.

Mastiffs are impressive hounds prized by humanoids for their loyalty and keen Sentidos.
[ Méduse ]
Medium monstrosity, Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 15 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 127 (17d8 + 51)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
10 (+0)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
12 (+1)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
15 (+2)
Perícias Enganação +5, Intuição +4, Percepção +4, Furtividade +5
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Comum
Nível de Desafio 6 (2300 XP)

Petrifying Gaze. When a creature that can see the medusa's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the medusa, the medusa can force it to make a CD 14 Constitution saving throw if the medusa isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the medusa until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the medusa in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If the medusa sees itself reflected on a polished surface within 30 feet of it and in an area of bright light, the medusa is, due to its curse, affected by its own gaze.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The medusa makes either three melee attacks -one with its snake hair and two with its shortsword- or two ranged attacks with its longbow.

Snake Hair. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 4 (1d4 + 2) de dano perfurante mais 14 (4d6) de dano de veneno.

Shortsword. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Longbow. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +5 para atingir, distância 150/600 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d8 + 2) de dano perfurante mais 7 (2d6) de dano de veneno.

A victim of a terrible curse, the serpent-haired medusa petrifies all those who gaze upon it, turning creatures into stone monuments to its corruption.

Anfíbio. The merfolk can breathe air and water.

Spear. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +2 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 20/18 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 3 (1d6) piercing damage, ou 4 (1d8) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Merfolk are aquatic humanoids with the lower body of a fish. They live in small tribes beneath the waves.

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 9 (2d4 + 4) de dano cortante.

Harpoon. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 20/18 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Strength contest against the merrow or be pulled up to 20 feet toward the merrow.

18 (+4)
DES

CON
16 (+3)
INT
7 (-2)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR

Perícias Percepção +3
Resistência a Dano frio, fogo, lightning; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos

Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 18 mt., Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas Abyssal, Infernal, Telepatia 18 mt.
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Innate Spellcasting. The mezzoloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 11). The mezzoloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

2/day each: darkness, dispel magic
1/day: cloudkill

Resistência à Magia. The mezzoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Armas Mágicas. The mezzoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The mezzoloth makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its trident.

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 9 (2d4 + 4) de dano cortante.

Trident. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 20/18 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, ou 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage when held with two claws and used to make a melee attack.

Teletransporte. The mezzoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

[ Mimique ]
Medium monstrosity (shapechanger), Neutro
Classe de Armadura 12 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 58 (9d8 + 18)
Deslocamento 4.5 mt.
FOR
17 (+3)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
15 (+2)
INT
5 (-3)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
8 (-1)
Perícias Furtividade +5
Imunidade a Dano ácido
Imunidade a Condição caído
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Shapechanger. The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Adhesive (Object Form Only). The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape CD 13). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

False Appearance (Object Form Only). While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

Grappler. The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

Ações

Pseudopod. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d8 + 3) de dano de concussão. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d8 + 3) de dano perfurante mais 4 (1d8) de dano de ácido.

Charge. If the minotaur moves at least 3 metros straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 3 metros away and knocked prone.

Labyrinthine Recall. The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

Reckless. At the start of its turn, the minotaur can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

Ações

Their fur stained with the blood of fallen foes, minotaurs are massive, bull-headed humanoids whose roar is a savage battle cry that all civilized creatures fear.

Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Aquan, Terran
Nível de Desafio 1/4 (50 XP)

Death Burst. When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of sticky mud. Each Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a CD 11 (Destreza) or be restrained until the end of the creature's next turn.

False Appearance. While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary mound of mud.

Ações

Fists. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 4 (1d6 + 1) de dano de concussão.

Mud Breath (Recarrega 6). The mephit belches viscid mud onto one creature within 5 feet of it. If the target is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a CD 11 (Destreza) or be restrained for 1 minute. Uma criatura pode repetir o teste de resistência no final de cada um dos turnos dela, terminando o efeito sobre si, caso obtenha sucesso.

Beast of Burden. The mule is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

Sure-Footed. The mule has advantage on Strength and (Destreza)s made against effects that would knock it prone.

Ações

[ Momie ]
Medium undead, Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 11 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 58 (9d8 + 18)
Deslocamento 6 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
8 (-1)
CON
15 (+2)
INT
6 (-2)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
12 (+1)
Testes de Resistência Sab +2
Damage vulnerabilities fogo
Resistência a Dano concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano necrótico, veneno
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, exausto, amedrontado, paralisado, envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas the Idiomas it knew in life
Nível de Desafio 3 (700 XP)
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.

Rotting Fist. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (2d6 + 3) de dano de concussão plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 12 (Constituição) ou be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain Pontos de Vida, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or other magic.

Dreadful Glare. The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a CD 11 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.

Raised by dark funerary rituals and still wrapped in the shrouds of death, mummies shamble out from lost temples and tombs to slay any who disturb their rest.
[ Seigneur momie ]
Medium undead, Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 17 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 97 (13d8 + 39)
Deslocamento 6 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
10 (+0)
CON
17 (+3)
INT
11 (+0)
SAB
18 (+4)
CAR
16 (+3)
Testes de Resistência Con +8, Int +5, Sab +9, Car +8
Perícias História +5, Religião +5
Damage vulnerabilities fogo
Imunidade a Dano necrótico, veneno; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, exausto, amedrontado, paralisado, envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas the Idiomas it knew in life
Nível de Desafio 15 (13000 XP)

Resistência à Magia. The mummy lord has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Rejuvenation. A destroyed mummy lord gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, regaining all its Pontos de Vida and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the mummy lord's heart.

Conjuração. The mummy lord is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save CD 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The mummy lord has the following cleric spells prepared:

Truques (à vontade): chama sagrada, taumaturgia
1° nível (4 espaços): command, guiding bolt, shield of faith
2° nível (3 espaços): hold person, silence, spiritual weapon
3° nível (3 espaços): animate dead, dispel magic
4° nível (3 espaços): divination, guardian of faith
5° nível (2 espaços): contagion, insect plague
6° nível (1 espaço): harm
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.

Rotting Fist. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +9 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 14 (3d6 + 4) de dano de concussão plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 16 (Constituição) ou be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain Pontos de Vida, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or other magic.

Dreadful Glare. The mummy lord targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy lord, it must succeed on a CD 16 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies and mummy lords for the next 24 hours.

AÇÕES LENDÁRIAS

The mummy lord can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The mummy lord regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Attack. The mummy lord makes one attack with its rotting fist or uses its Dreadful Glare.

Blinding Dust. Blinding dust and sand swirls magically around the mummy lord. Each creature within 5 feet of the mummy lord must succeed on a CD 16 (Constituição) ou be blinded until the end of the creature's next turn.

Blasphemous Word (Custa 2 Ações). The mummy lord utters a blasphemous word. Each non-undead creature within 3 metros of the mummy lord that can hear the magical utterance must succeed on a CD 16 (Constituição) ou be stunned until the end of the mummy lord's next turn.

Channel Negative Energy (Custa 2 Ações). The mummy lord magically unleashes negative energy. Creatures within 60 feet of the mummy lord, including ones behind barriers and around corners, can't regain Pontos de Vida until the end of the mummy lord's next turn.

Vendaval of Sand (Custa 2 Ações). The mummy lord magically transforms into a whirlwind of sand, moves up to 60 feet, and reverts to its normal form. While in whirlwind form, the mummy lord is immune to all damage, and it can't be agarrado, petrificado, knocked caído, impedido, ou stunned. Equipment worn or carried by the mummy lord remain in its possession.

[ Nalfeshnie ]
Large fiend (demônio), Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 18 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 184 (16d10 + 96)
Deslocamento 6 mt., Voo 9 mt.
FOR
21 (+5)
DES
10 (+0)
CON
22 (+6)
INT
19 (+4)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
15 (+2)
Testes de Resistência Con +11, Int +9, Sab +6, Car +7
Resistência a Dano frio, fogo, lightning; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão verdadeira 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas Abyssal, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 13 (10000 XP)

Resistência à Magia. The nalfeshnee has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The nalfeshnee uses Horror Nimbus if it can. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +10 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 32 (5d10 + 5) de dano perfurante.

Garra. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +10 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 15 (3d6 + 5) de dano cortante.

Horror Nimbus (Recarrega 5–6). The nalfeshnee magically emits scintillating, multicolored light. Each creature within 15 feet of the nalfeshnee that can see the light must succeed on a CD 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. Uma criatura pode repetir o teste de resistência no final de cada um dos turnos dela, terminando o efeito sobre si, caso obtenha sucesso. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the nalfeshnee's Horror Nimbus for the next 24 hours.

Teletransporte. The nalfeshnee magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Idiomas understands Common but can't speak

[ Guenaude nocturne ]
Medium fiend, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 17 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 112 (15d8 + 45)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
16 (+3)
SAB
14 (+2)
CAR
16 (+3)
Perícias Enganação +7, Intuição +6, Percepção +6, Furtividade +6
Resistência a Dano frio, fogo; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos not made with silvered weapons
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 16
Idiomas Abyssal, Comum, Infernal, Primordial
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Innate Spellcasting. The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect magic, magic missile
2/day each: plane shift (self only), ray of enfeeblement, sleep

Resistência à Magia. The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ações

Claws (Hag Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 13 (2d8 + 4) de dano cortante.

Mudar Forma. The hag magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium female humanoid, ou back into her true form. Her statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. She reverts to her true form if she dies.

Etherealness. The hag magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, ou vice versa. To do so, the hag must have a heartstone in her possession.

Nightmare Haunting (1/Day). While on the Ethereal Plane, the hag magically touches a sleeping humanoid on the Material Plane. A protection from evil and good spell cast on the target prevents this contact, as does a magic circle. As long as the contact persists, the target has dreadful visions. If these visions last for at least 1 hour, the target gains no benefit from its rest, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 5 (1d10). If this effect reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and if the target was evil, its soul is trapped in the hag's soul bag. The reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until removed by the greater restoration spell or similar magic.

[ Destrier noir ]
Large fiend, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 13 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 68 (8d10 + 24)
Deslocamento 18 mt., Voo 27 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
15 (+2)
Imunidade a Dano fogo
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas understands Abyssal, Comum, and Infernal but can't speak
Nível de Desafio 3 (700 XP)

Confer Fire Resistance. The nightmare can grant resistance to fire damage to anyone riding it.

Illumination. The nightmare sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 3 metros.

Ações

Hooves. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 13 (2d8 + 4) de dano de concussão plus 7 (2d6) de dano de fogo.

Ethereal Stride. The nightmare and up to three willing creatures within 5 feet of it magically enter the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, ou vice versa.

[ Noble ]
Humanóide Médio (qualquer raça), qualquer tendência
Classe de Armadura 15 (breastplate)
Pontos de Vida 9 (2d8)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
11 (+0)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
11 (+0)
INT
12 (+1)
SAB
14 (+2)
CAR
16 (+3)
Perícias Enganação +5, Intuição +4, Persuasão +5
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas any two Idiomas
Nível de Desafio 1/8 (25 XP)
Ações

Rapier. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d8 + 1) de dano perfurante.

REACTIONS

Parry. The noble adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the noble must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Nobles wield great authority and influence as members of the upper class, possessing wealth and connections that can make them as powerful as monarchs and generals. A noble often travels in the company of guards, as well as servants who are commoners.
The noble's statistics can also be used to represent courtiers who aren't of noble birth.
[ Nothic ]
Medium aberration, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 15 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 45 (6d8 + 18)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
14 (+2)
DES
16 (+3)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
13 (+1)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
8 (-1)
Perícias Arcana +3, Intuição +4, Percepção +2, Furtividade +5
Sentidos Visão verdadeira 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas Undercommon
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Keen Sight. The nothic has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The nothic makes two claw attacks.

Garra. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano cortante.

Rotting Gaze. The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a CD 12 Constitution saving throw against this magic or take 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

Weird Insight. The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must contest its Charisma (Deception) check against the nothic's Wisdom (Insight) check. If the nothic wins, it magically learns one fact or secret about the target. The target automatically wins if it is immune to being charmed.

A nothic is a monstrous creature with terrible talons and a single great eye. When driven to violence, it uses its horrific gaze to rot the flesh from its enemies' bones.
[ Nycaloth ]
Large fiend (yugoloth), Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 18 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 123 (13d10 + 52)
Deslocamento 12 mt., Voo 18 mt.
FOR
20 (+5)
DES
11 (+0)
CON
19 (+4)
INT
12 (+1)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
15 (+2)
Perícias Intimidation +6, Percepção +4, Furtividade +4
Resistência a Dano frio, fogo, lightning; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano ácido, veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 18 mt., Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Abyssal, Infernal, Telepatia 18 mt.
Nível de Desafio 9 (5000 XP)

Innate Spellcasting. The nycaloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. The nycaloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only), mirror image

Resistência à Magia. The nycaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Armas Mágicas. The nycaloth's weapon attacks are magical.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The nycaloth makes two melee attacks, ou it makes one melee attack and teleports before or after the attack.

Garra. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +9 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 16 (Constituição) ou take 5 (2d4) slashing damage at the start of each of its turns due to a fiendish wound. Each time the nycaloth hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 (2d4). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful CD 13 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

Greataxe. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +9 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 18 (2d12 + 5) de dano cortante.

Teletransporte. The nycaloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

[ Gelée ocre ]
Large ooze, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 8
Pontos de Vida 45 (6d10 + 12)
Deslocamento 3 mt., Escalada 3 mt.
FOR
15 (+2)
DES
6 (-2)
CON
14 (+2)
INT
2 (-4)
SAB
6 (-2)
CAR
1 (-5)
Resistência a Dano ácido
Imunidade a Dano elétrico, slashing
Imunidade a Condição blinded, enfeitiçado, deafened, exausto, amedrontado, prone
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 18 mt. (blind beyond this radius), Percepção Passiva 8
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Amorphous. The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

Spider Climb. The jelly can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Ações

Pseudopod. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 9 (2d6 + 2) de dano de concussão plus 3 (1d6) de dano de ácido.

REACTIONS

Split. When a jelly that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new jellies if it has at least 10 Pontos de Vida. Each new jelly has Pontos de Vida equal to half the original jelly's, rounded down. New jellies are one size smaller than the original jelly.

An ochre jelly is a yellowish ooze that can slide under doors and through narrow cracks in pursuit of creatures to devour.
[ Pieuvre ]
Small beast, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 3 (1d6)
Deslocamento 1.5 mt., Natação 9 mt.
FOR
4 (-3)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
11 (+0)
INT
3 (-4)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
4 (-3)
Perícias Percepção +2, Furtividade +4
Sentidos Visão no escuro 9 mt., Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 0 (10 XP)

Hold Breath. While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

Underwater Camouflage. The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

Water Breathing. The octopus can breathe only underwater.

Ações

Tentacles. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 1 bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape CD 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest). A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

Javelin. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 30/16 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d6 + 4) de dano perfurante.

Ogres are hulking giants notorious for their quick tempers. When its rage is incited, an ogre lashes out in a frustrated tantrum until it runs out of objects or creatures to smash.

Undead Fortitude. If damage reduces the zombie to 0 Pontos de Vida, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a CD of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

Ações

Morningstar. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 13 (2d8 + 4) de dano de concussão.

[ Oni ]
Large giant, Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 16 (chain mail)
Pontos de Vida 110 (13d10 + 39)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 9 mt.
FOR
19 (+4)
DES
11 (+0)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
14 (+2)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
15 (+2)
Testes de Resistência Des +3, Con +6, Sab +4, Car +5
Perícias Arcana +5, Enganação +8, Percepção +4
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Comum, Giant
Nível de Desafio 7 (2900 XP)

Innate Spellcasting. The oni's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 13). The oni can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: darkness, invisibility
1/day each: charm person, cone of cold, gaseous form, sleep

Armas Mágicas. The oni's weapon attacks are magical.

Regeneration. The oni regains 10 Pontos de Vida at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The oni makes two attacks, either with its claws or its glaive.

Claw (Oni Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 8 (1d8 + 4) de dano cortante.

Glaive. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage, ou 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage in Small or Medium form.

Mudar Forma. The oni magically polymorphs into a Small or Humanóide Médio, into a Large giant, ou back into its true form. Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. The only equipment that is transformed is its glaive, which shrinks so that it can be wielded in humanoid form. If the oni dies, it reverts to its true form, and its glaive reverts to its normal size.

Idiomas Comum, ouc

Aggressive. As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its Deslocamento toward a hostile creature that it can see.

Ações

Greataxe. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 9 (1d12 + 3) de dano cortante.

Javelin. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 30/16 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano perfurante.

Orcs are savage humanoids with stooped postures, piggish faces, and prominent teeth that resemble tusks. They gather in tribes that satisfy their bloodlust by slaying any humanoids that stand against them.
[ Orque, Oeil de Gruumsh ]
Humanóide Médio (orc), Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 16 (ring mail, shield)
Pontos de Vida 45 (6d8 + 18)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
9 (-1)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
12 (+1)
Perícias Intimidation +3, Religião +1
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas Comum, ouc
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Aggressive. As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its Deslocamento toward a hostile creature that it can see.

Gruumsh's Fury. The orc deals an extra 4 (1d8) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attack).

Conjuração. The orc is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save CD 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The orc has the following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at-will): guidance, resistance, taumaturgia
1° nível (4 espaços): bênção, command
2° nível (2 espaços): augury, spiritual weapon (spear)
Ações

Spear. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 20/18 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (1d6 + 3 plus 1d8) piercing damage, ou 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

12 (+1)
Perícias Intimidation +5, Survival +2
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Comum, ouc
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Aggressive. As a bonus action, the orog can move up to its Deslocamento toward a hostile creature that it can see.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The orog makes two greataxe attacks.

Greataxe. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (1d12 + 4) de dano cortante.

Javelin. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 30/16 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d6 + 4) de dano perfurante.

[ Otyugh ]
Aberração Grande, Neutro
Classe de Armadura 14 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 114 (12d10 + 48)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
11 (+0)
CON
19 (+4)
INT
6 (-2)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
6 (-2)
Testes de Resistência Con +7
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas Otyugh
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Limited Telepathy. The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 feet of it that can understand a language. This form of Telepatia doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The otyugh makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its tentacles.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 15 Constitution saving throw against disease or become envenenado until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 (1d10) on a failure. The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.

Tentáculo. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d8 + 3) de dano de concussão plus 4 (1d8) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape CD 13) and restrained until the grapple ends. The otyugh has two tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

Tentacle Slam. The otyugh slams creatures grappled by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a CD 14 (Constituição) ou take 10 (2d6 + 3) de dano de concussão and be stunned until the end of the otyugh's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't stunned.

Dive Attack. If the peryton is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 9 (2d8) damage to the target.

Flyby. The peryton doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Keen Sight and Smell. The peryton has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight or smell.

[ Araignée de phase ]

Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10

Ethereal Jaunt. As a bonus action, the spider can magically shift from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, ou vice versa.

Spider Climb. The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Web Walker. The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a CD 11 (Constituição), sofrendo 18 (4d8) de dano de veneno se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 Pontos de Vida, the target is stable but envenenado for 1 hour, even after regaining Pontos de Vida, and is paralyzed while envenenado in this way.

A phase spider possesses the magical ability to phase in and out of the Ethereal Plane. It seems to appear out of nowhere and quickly vanishes after attacking.

False Appearance. While the piercer remains motionless on the ceiling, it is indistinguishable from a normal stalactite.

Spider Climb. The piercer can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Ações

Drop. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, one creature directly underneath the piercer. Acerto: 3 (1d6) piercing damage per 3 metros fallen, up to 21 (6d6). Miss: The piercer takes half the normal falling damage for the distance fallen.

[ Diantrefosse ]
Large fiend (devil), Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 19 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 300 (24d10 + 168)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 18 mt.
FOR
26 (+8)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
24 (+7)
INT
22 (+6)
SAB
18 (+4)
CAR
24 (+7)
Testes de Resistência Des +8, Con +13, Sab +10
Resistência a Dano frio; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos that aren't silvered
Imunidade a Dano fogo, veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão verdadeira 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Infernal, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 20 (25000 XP)

Fear Aura. Any creature hostile to the pit fiend that starts its turn within 20 feet of the pit fiend must make a CD 21 Wisdom saving throw, unless the pit fiend is incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is frightened until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the pit fiend's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

Resistência à Magia. The pit fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Armas Mágicas. The pit fiend's weapon attacks are magical.

Innate Spellcasting. The pit fiend's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 21). The pit fiend can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect magic, fireball
3/day each: hold monster, wall of fire
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The pit fiend makes four attacks: one with its bite, one with its claw, one with its mace, and one with its tail.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +14 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 22 (4d6 + 8) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a CD 21 (Constituição) ou become envenenado. While envenenado in this way, the target can't regain Pontos de Vida, and it takes 21 (6d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The envenenado target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Garra. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +14 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 17 (2d8 + 8) de dano cortante.

Mace. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +14 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 15 (2d6 + 8) de dano de concussão plus 21 (6d6) de dano de fogo.

Cauda. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +14 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 24 (3d10 + 8) de dano de concussão.

[ Planétar ]
Large celestial, leal e Bom
Classe de Armadura 19 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 200 (16d10 + 112)
Deslocamento 12 mt., Voo 36 mt.
FOR
24 (+7)
DES
20 (+5)
CON
24 (+7)
INT
19 (+4)
SAB
22 (+6)
CAR
25 (+7)
Testes de Resistência Con +12, Sab +11, Car +12
Perícias Percepção +11
Resistência a Dano radiant; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, exausto, amedrontado
Sentidos Visão verdadeira 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 21
Idiomas all, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 16 (15000 XP)

Angelic Weapons. The planetar's weapon attacks are magical. When the planetar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 5d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

Divine Awareness. The planetar knows if it hears a lie.

Innate Spellcasting. The planetar's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 20). The planetar can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect evil and good, invisibility (self only)
3/day each: blade barrier, dispel evil and good, flame strike, raise dead
1/day each: commune, control weather, insect plague

Resistência à Magia. The planetar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The planetar makes two melee attacks.

Greatsword. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +12 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 21 (4d6 + 7) slashing damage plus 22 (5d8) radiant damage.

Healing Touch (4/Dia). The planetar touches another creature. The target magically regains 30 (6d8 + 3) Pontos de Vida and is freed from any curse, disease, veneno, blindness, ou deafness.

[ Prêtre ]
Humanóide Médio (qualquer raça), qualquer tendência
Classe de Armadura 13 (chain shirt)
Pontos de Vida 27 (5d8 + 5)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
10 (+0)
DES
10 (+0)
CON
12 (+1)
INT
13 (+1)
SAB
16 (+3)
CAR
13 (+1)
Perícias Medicina +7, Persuasão +3, Religião +5
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas any two Idiomas
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Divine Eminence. As a bonus action, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

Conjuração. The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save CD 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The priest has the following cleric spells prepared:

Truques (à vontade): luz, chama sagrada, taumaturgia
1° nível (4 espaços): curar ferimentos, guiding bolt, santuário
2° nível (3 espaços): lesser restoration, spiritual weapon
3° nível (2 espaços): dispel magic, spirit guardians
Ações

Mace. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +2 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 3 (1d6) de dano de concussão.

Priests bring the teachings of their gods to the common folk. They are the spiritual leaders of temples and shrines and often hold positions of influence in their communities. Evil priests might work openly under a tyrant, ou they might be the leaders of religious sects hidden in the shadows of good society, overseeing depraved rites.
A priest typically has one or more acolytes to help with religious ceremonies and other sacred duties.
[ Pseudodragon ]
Tiny dragon, Neutro e Bom
Classe de Armadura 13 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 7 (2d4 + 2)
Deslocamento 4.5 mt., Voo 18 mt.
FOR
6 (-2)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
13 (+1)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
10 (+0)
Perícias Percepção +3, Furtividade +4
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 3 mt., Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas understands Common and Dracônico but can't speak
Nível de Desafio 1/4 (50 XP)

Keen Sentidos. The pseudodragon has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight, hearing, ou smell.

Resistência à Magia. The pseudodragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Limited Telepathy. The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d4 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Sting. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a CD 11 (Constituição) ou become envenenado for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls unconscious for the same duration, ou until it takes damage or another creature uses an action to shake it awake.

These flying reptilian cousins to the dinosaurs have no teeth, instead using their sharp beaks to stab prey too large to swallow with one gulp.
[ Ver pourpre ]
Gargantuan monstrosity, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 18 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 247 (15d20 + 90)
Deslocamento 15 mt., Escavação 9 mt.
FOR
28 (+9)
DES
7 (-2)
CON
22 (+6)
INT
1 (-5)
SAB
8 (-1)
CAR
4 (-3)
Testes de Resistência Con +11, Sab +4
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 9 mt., tremorsense 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 9
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 15 (13000 XP)

Tunneler. The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow Deslocamento and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The worm makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +14 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 22 (3d8 + 9) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a CD 19 (Destreza) or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is blinded and impedido, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the worm's turns. If the worm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a CD 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 3 metros of the worm. If the worm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

Tail Stinger. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +14 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., one creature. Acerto: 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage, and the target must make a CD 19 (Constituição), sofrendo 42 (12d6) de dano de veneno se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Quasit ]
Tiny fiend (demon, shapechanger), Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 13
Pontos de Vida 7 (3d4)
Deslocamento 12 mt.
FOR
5 (-3)
DES
17 (+3)
CON
10 (+0)
INT
7 (-2)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
10 (+0)
Perícias Furtividade +5
Resistência a Dano frio, fogo, lightning; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Abyssal, Common
Nível de Desafio 1 (200 XP)

Shapechanger. The quasit can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a bat (Deslocamento 3 mt. voo 12 mt.), a centipede (12 mt., Escalada 12 mt.), ou a toad (12 mt., Natação 12 mt.), ou back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the Deslocamento changes noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Resistência à Magia. The quasit has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ações

Claws (Bite in Beast Form). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a CD 10 (Constituição) ou take 5 (2d4) poison damage and become envenenado for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Scare (1/Day). One creature of the quasit's choice within 20 feet of it must succeed on a CD 10 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the quasit is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Invisibility. The quasit magically turns invisible until it attacks or uses Scare, ou until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the quasit wears or carries is invisible with it.

[ Piranha ]
Tiny beast, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 13
Pontos de Vida 1 (1d4 - 1)
Deslocamento 0 mt., Natação 12 mt.
FOR
2 (-4)
DES
16 (+3)
CON
9 (-1)
INT
1 (-5)
SAB
7 (-2)
CAR
2 (-4)
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 8
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 0 (10 XP)

Blood Frenzy. The quipper has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its Pontos de Vida.

Water Breathing. The quipper can breathe only underwater.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 1 de dano perfurante.

A quipper is a carnivorous fish with sharp teeth.
[ Rakshasa ]
Medium fiend, Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 16 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 110 (13d8 + 52)
Deslocamento 12 mt.
FOR
14 (+2)
DES
17 (+3)
CON
18 (+4)
INT
13 (+1)
SAB
16 (+3)
CAR
20 (+5)
Perícias Enganação +10, Intuição +8
Damage vulnerabilities piercing from magic weapons wielded by good creatures
Imunidade a Dano concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas Comum, Infernal
Nível de Desafio 13 (10000 XP)

Limited Magic Immunity. The rakshasa can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

Innate Spellcasting. The rakshasa's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The rakshasa can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect thoughts, disguise self, mage hand, minor illusion
3/day each: charm person, detect magic, invisibility, major image, suggestion
1/day each: dominate person, fly, plane shift, true seeing
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The rakshasa makes two claw attacks.

Garra. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage, and the target is cursed if it is a creature. The magical curse takes effect whenever the target takes a short or long rest, filling the target's thoughts with horrible images and dreams. The cursed target gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest. The curse lasts until it is lifted by a remove curse spell or similar magic.

Mimicry. The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, ou an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful CD 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

11 (+0)

Imunidade a Dano fogo

Sopro Flamejante (Recarrega 5–6). O dragão expele fogo num cone de 4,5 metros. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 13 (Destreza), sofrendo 24 (7d6) de dano de fogo se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Requin de récif ]
Besta Média, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 12 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 22 (4d8 + 4)
Deslocamento 0 mt., Natação 12 mt.
FOR
14 (+2)
DES
13 (+1)
CON
13 (+1)
INT
1 (-5)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
4 (-3)
Perícias Percepção +2
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 9 mt., Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Pack Tactics. The shark has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Water Breathing. The shark can breathe only underwater.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d8 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Reef sharks measure 6 to 3 metros long, and inhabit shallow waters and coral reefs.
[ Rémorhaz ]
Monstruosidade Enorme, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 17 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 195 (17d12 + 85)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Escavação 6 mt.
FOR
24 (+7)
DES
13 (+1)
CON
21 (+5)
INT
4 (-3)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
5 (-3)
Imunidade a Dano frio, fogo
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., tremorsense 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 11 (7200 XP)

Heated Body. A creature that touches the remorhaz or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) de dano de fogo.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +11 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 40 (6d10 + 7) de dano perfurante mais 10 (3d6) fire damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape CD 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is impedido, and the remorhaz can't bite another target.

Swallow. The remorhaz makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and impedido, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the remorhaz, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the remorhaz's turns. If the remorhaz takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the remorhaz must succeed on a CD 15 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 3 metros of the remorhaz. If the remorhaz dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

[ Revenant ]
Medium undead, Neutro
Classe de Armadura 13 (leather armor)
Pontos de Vida 136 (16d8 + 64)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
18 (+4)
INT
13 (+1)
SAB
16 (+3)
CAR
18 (+4)
Testes de Resistência For +7, Con +7, Sab +6, Car +7
Resistência a Dano necrótico, psychic
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, exausto, amedrontado, paralisado, envenenado, stunned
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas the Idiomas it knew in life
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Regeneration. The revenant regains 10 Pontos de Vida at the start of its turn. If the revenant takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the revenant's next turn. The revenant's body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 Pontos de Vida and doesn't regenerate.

Rejuvenation. When the revenant's body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another humanoid corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its Pontos de Vida. While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

Turn Immunity. The revenant is immune to effects that turn undead.

Vengeful Tracker. The revenant knows the distance to and direction of any creature against which it seeks revenge, even if the creature and the revenant are on different planes of existence. If the creature being tracked by the revenant dies, the revenant knows.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The revenant makes two fist attacks.

Fist. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d6 + 4) de dano de concussão. If the target is a creature against which the revenant has sworn vengeance, the target takes an extra 14 (4d6) de dano de concussão. Instead of dealing damage, the revenant can grapple the target (escape CD 14) provided the target is Large or smaller.

Vengeful Glare. The revenant targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it and against which it has sworn vengeance. The target must make a CD 15 (Sabedoria). On a failure, the target is paralyzed until the revenant deals damage to it, ou until the end of the revenant's next turn. When the paralysis ends, the target is frightened of the revenant for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if it can see the revenant, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success.

[ Rhinocéros ]
Besta Grande, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 11 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 45 (6d10 + 12)
Deslocamento 12 mt.
FOR
21 (+5)
DES
8 (-1)
CON
15 (+2)
INT
2 (-4)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
6 (-2)
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Charge. If the rhinoceros moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) de dano de concussão. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 15 (Força) para não cair no chão.

Ações

Gore. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 14 (2d8 + 5) de dano de concussão.

[ Roc ]
Gargantuan monstrosity, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 15 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 248 (16d20 + 80)
Deslocamento 6 mt., Voo 36 mt.
FOR
28 (+9)
DES
10 (+0)
CON
20 (+5)
INT
3 (-4)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
9 (-1)
Testes de Resistência Des +4, Con +9, Sab +4, Car +3
Perícias Percepção +4
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 11 (7200 XP)

Keen Sight. The roc has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The roc makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

Beak. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +13 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 27 (4d8 + 9) de dano perfurante.

Talons. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +13 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 23 (4d6 + 9) slashing damage, and the target is grappled (escape CD 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is impedido, and the roc can't use its talons on another target.

[ Enlaceur ]
Large monstrosity, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 20 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 93 (11d10 + 33)
Deslocamento 3 mt., Escalada 3 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
8 (-1)
CON
17 (+3)
INT
7 (-2)
SAB
16 (+3)
CAR
6 (-2)
Perícias Percepção +6, Furtividade +5
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 16
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

False Appearance. While the roper remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal cave formation, such as a stalagmite.

Grasping Tendrils. The roper can have up to six tendrils at a time. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 20; 10 Pontos de Vida; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the roper, which can extrude a replacement tendril on its next turn. A tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a CD 15 Strength check against it.

Spider Climb. The roper can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The roper makes four attacks with its tendrils, uses Reel, and makes one attack with its bite.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 22 (4d8 + 4) de dano perfurante.

Tendril. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 15 mt., one creature. Acerto: The target is grappled (escape CD 15). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained and has disadvantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, and the roper can't use the same tendril on another target.

Reel. The roper pulls each creature grappled by it up to 25 feet straight toward it.

[ Tapis étouffant ]
Large construct, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 33 (6d10)
Deslocamento 3 mt.
FOR
17 (+3)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
10 (+0)
INT
1 (-5)
SAB
3 (-4)
CAR
1 (-5)
Imunidade a Dano veneno, psychic
Imunidade a Condição blinded, enfeitiçado, deafened, amedrontado, paralisado, petrificado, envenenado
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 18 mt. (blind beyond this radius), Percepção Passiva 6
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Antimagic Susceptibility. The rug is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the rug must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save CD or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

Damage Transfer. While it is grappling a creature, the rug takes only half the damage dealt to it, and the creature grappled by the rug takes the other half.

False Appearance. While the rug remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal rug.

Ações

Smother. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one Medium or smaller creature. Acerto: The creature is grappled (escape CD 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is impedido, blinded, and at risk of suffocating, and the rug can't smother another target. In addition, at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes 10 (2d6 + 3) de dano de concussão.

[ Oxydeur ]
Medium monstrosity, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 14 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 27 (5d8 + 5)
Deslocamento 12 mt
FOR
13 (+1)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
13 (+1)
INT
2 (-4)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
6 (-2)
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Iron Scent. The rust monster can pinpoint, by scent, the location of ferrous metal within 30 feet of it.

Rust Metal. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the rust monster corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the rust monster is destroyed after dealing damage.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d8 + 1) de dano perfurante.

Antennae. The rust monster corrodes a nonmagical ferrous metal object it can see within 5 feet of it. If the object isn't being worn or carried, the touch destroys a 1-foot cube of it. If the object is being worn or carried by a creature, the creature can make a CD 11 (Destreza) to avoid the rust monster's touch. If the object touched is either metal armor or a metal shield being worn or carried, its takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed. If the object touched is a held metal weapon, it rusts as described in the Rust Metal trait.

[ Tigre à dents de sabre ]

Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 52 (7d10 + 14)
Deslocamento 12 mt.

CAR

Sentidos Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Keen Smell. The tiger has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on smell.

Bote. If the tiger moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a CD 14 (Força) para não cair no chão. If the target is caído, the tiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (1d10 + 5) de dano perfurante.

Garra. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 12 (2d6 + 5) de dano cortante.

[ Sahuagin ]
Humanóide Médio (sahuagin), Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 12 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 22 (4d8 + 4)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Natação 12 mt.
FOR
13 (+1)
DES
11 (+0)
CON
12 (+1)
INT
12 (+1)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
9 (-1)
Perícias Percepção +5
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 15
Idiomas Sahuagin
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Blood Frenzy. The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its Pontos de Vida.

Limited Amphibiousness. The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

Shark Telepathy. The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited Telepatia.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The sahuagin makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or spear.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 3 (1d4 + 1) de dano perfurante.

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 3 (1d4 + 1) de dano cortante.

Spear. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 20/18 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, ou 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

[ Salamandre ]
Elemental Grande, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 15 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 90 (12d10 + 24)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
15 (+2)
INT
11 (+0)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
12 (+1)
Damage vulnerabilities frio
Resistência a Dano concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano fogo
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Ignan
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Heated Body. A creature that touches the salamander or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) de dano de fogo.

Heated Weapons. Any metal melee weapon the salamander wields deals an extra 3 (1d6) fire damage on a hit (included in the attack).

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The salamander makes two attacks: one with its spear and one with its tail.

Spear. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 6 mt./18 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, ou 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 (1d6) de dano de fogo.

Cauda. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d6 + 4) de dano de concussão plus 7 (2d6) fire damage, and the target is grappled (escape CD 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is impedido, the salamander can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the salamander can't make tail attacks against other targets.

[ Satyre ]

Classe de Armadura 14 (leather armor)
Pontos de Vida 31 (7d8)
Deslocamento 12 mt.
FOR

DES

Perícias Percepção +2, Performance +6, Furtividade +5
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas Comum, Elvish, Sylvan
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Resistência à Magia. The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ações

Ram. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (2d4 + 1) de dano de concussão.

Shortsword. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano perfurante.

Shortbow. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +5 para atingir, distância 80/36 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano perfurante.

Satyrs are raucous fey that resemble stout male humans with the furry lower bodies and cloven hooves of goats. They frolic in wild forests, driven by curiosity and hedonism in equal measure.

Sting. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +2 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 1 piercing damage, and the target must make a CD 9 (Constituição), sofrendo 4 (1d8) de dano de veneno se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Éclaireur ]
Humanóide Médio (qualquer raça), qualquer tendência

Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
11 (+0)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
12 (+1)

SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
11 (+0)
Perícias Nature +4, Percepção +5, Furtividade +6, Survival +5
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 15
Idiomas um idioma qualquer (geralmente Comum)
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Keen Hearing and Sight. The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

Shortsword. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Longbow. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, distânciad 150/600 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d8 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Scouts are skilled hunters and trackers who offer their services for a fee. Most hunt wild game, but a few work as bounty hunters, serve as guides, ou provide military reconnaissance.
[ Guenaude aquatique ]
Medium fey, Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 14 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 52 (7d8 + 21)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Natação 12 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
13 (+1)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
12 (+1)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
13 (+1)
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas Aquan, Comum, Giant
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Anfíbio. The hag can breathe air and water.

Horrific Appearance. Any humanoid that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hag and can see the hag's true form must make a CD 11 (Sabedoria). On a failed save, the creature is frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the hag is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the hag's Horrific Appearance for the next 24 hours. Unless the target is surprised or the revelation of the hag's true form is sudden, the target can avert its eyes and avoid making the initial saving throw. Until the start of its next turn, a creature that averts its eyes has disadvantage on attack rolls against the hag.

Ações

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (2d6 + 3) de dano cortante.

Death Glare. The hag targets one frightened creature she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see the hag, it must succeed on a CD 11 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or drop to 0 Pontos de Vida.

Illusory Appearance. The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like an ugly creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The effect ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies. The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have no claws, but someone touching her hand might feel the claws. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a CD 16 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the hag is disguised.
