[ Ombre ]
Medium undead, Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 16 (3d8 + 3)
Deslocamento 12 mt.
FOR
6 (-2)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
13 (+1)
INT
6 (-2)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
8 (-1)
Perícias Furtividade +4 (+6 in dim light or darkness)
Damage vulnerabilities radiant
Resistência a Dano ácido, frio, fogo, lightning, trovejante; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano necrótico, veneno
Imunidade a Condição exausto, amedrontado, agarrado, paralisado, petrificado, envenenado, caído, restrained
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Amorphous. The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

Shadow Stealth. While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

Sunlight Weakness. While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

Ações

Strength Drain. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 9 (2d6 + 2) necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score is reduced by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.

[ Démon des ombres ]
Medium fiend (demônio), Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 13
Pontos de Vida 66 (12d8 + 12)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 9 mt.
FOR
1 (-5)
DES
17 (+3)
CON
12 (+1)
INT
14 (+2)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
14 (+2)
Testes de Resistência Des +5, Car +4
Perícias Furtividade +7
Damage vulnerabilities radiant
Resistência a Dano ácido, fogo, necrotic, trovejante; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano frio, lightning, veneno
Imunidade a Condição exausto, agarrado, paralisado, petrificado, envenenado, caído, restrained
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas Abyssal, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 4 (1100 XP)

Incorporeal Movement. The demon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Light Sensitivity. While in bright light, the demon has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Shadow Stealth. While in dim light or darkness, the demon can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

Ações

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 10 (2d6 + 3) psychic damage or, if the demon had advantage on the attack roll, 17 (4d6 + 3) psychic damage.

[ Tertre errant ]
Large plant, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 15 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 136 (16d10 + 48)
Deslocamento 6 mt., Natação 6 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
8 (-1)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
5 (-3)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
5 (-3)
Perícias Furtividade +2
Resistência a Dano frio, fogo
Imunidade a Dano elétrico
Imunidade a Condição blinded, deafened, exausto
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 18 mt. (blind beyond this radius), Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Lightning Absorption. Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of Pontos de Vida equal to the lightning damage dealt.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The shambling mound makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is grappled (escape CD 14), and the shambling mound uses its Engulf on it.

Pancada. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 13 (2d8 + 4) de dano de concussão.

Engulf. The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature grappled by it. The engulfed target is blinded, impedido, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a CD 14 Constitution saving throw at the start of each of the mound's turns or take 13 (2d8 + 4) de dano de concussão. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mound can have only one creature engulfed at a time.

[ Gardien animé ]
Large construct, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 17 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 142 (15d10 + 60)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
8 (-1)
CON
18 (+4)
INT
7 (-2)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
3 (-4)
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 3 mt., Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, exausto, amedrontado, paralisado, envenenado
Idiomas understands commands given in any language but can't speak
Nível de Desafio 7 (2900 XP)

Bound. The shield guardian is magically bound to an amulet. As long as the guardian and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet's wearer can telepathically call the guardian to travel to it, and the guardian knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the guardian is within 60 feet of the amulet's wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (rounded up) is transferred to the guardian.

Regeneration. The shield guardian regains 10 Pontos de Vida at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

Spell Storing. A spellcaster who wears the shield guardian's amulet can cause the guardian to store one spell of 4th level or lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the guardian. The spell has no effect but is stored within the guardian. When commanded to do so by the wearer or when a situation arises that was predefined by the spellcaster, the guardian casts the stored spell with any parameters set by the original caster, requiring no components. When the spell is cast or a new spell is stored, any previously stored spell is lost.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The guardian makes two fist attacks.

Fist. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d6 + 4) de dano de concussão.

REACTIONS

Shield. When a creature makes an attack against the wearer of the guardian's amulet, the guardian grants a +2 bonus to the wearer's AC if the guardian is within 5 feet of the wearer.

[ Criard ]
Medium plant, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 5
Pontos de Vida 13 (3d8)
Deslocamento 0 mt.
FOR
1 (-5)
DES
1 (-5)
CON
10 (+0)
INT
1 (-5)
SAB
3 (-4)
CAR
1 (-5)
Imunidade a Condição blinded, deafened, amedrontado
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 9 mt. (blind beyond this radius), Percepção Passiva 6
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 0 (10 XP)

False Appearance. While the shrieker remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

REACTIONS

Shriek. When bright light or a creature is within 30 feet of the shrieker, it emits a shriek audible within 300 feet of it. The shrieker continues to shriek until the disturbance moves out of range and for 1d4 of the shrieker's turns afterward.

[ Dragon d'argent, nouveau-né ]
Dragão Médio, leal e Bom
Classe de Armadura 17 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 45 (6d8 + 18)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 18 mt.
FOR
19 (+4)
DES
10 (+0)
CON
17 (+3)
INT
12 (+1)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
15 (+2)
Testes de Resistência Des +2, Con +5, Sab +2, Car +4
Perícias Percepção +4, Furtividade +2
Imunidade a Dano frio
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 3 mt., Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Dracônico
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)
Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 9 (1d10 + 4) de dano perfurante.

Arma de Sopro (Recarrega 5–6). O dragão usa um dos seguintes tipos de armas de sopro.

Sopro Congelante. O dragão expele uma explosão de gelo num cone de 4,5 metros. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 13 (Constituição), sofrendo 18 (4d8) de dano de frio se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

Sopro Paralisante. O dragão expele gás paralisante num cone de 4,5 metros. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 13 (Constituição) ou ficará paralisada por 1 minuto. Uma criatura pode repetir o teste de resistência no final de cada um dos turnos dela, terminando o efeito sobre si, caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Méphite de fumée ]
Small elemental, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 22 (5d6 + 5)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 9 mt.
FOR
6 (-2)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
12 (+1)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
11 (+0)
Perícias Percepção +2, Furtividade +4
Imunidade a Dano fogo, veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas Auran, Ignan
Nível de Desafio 1/4 (50 XP)

Death Burst. When the mephit dies, it leaves behind a cloud of smoke that fills a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on its space. The sphere is heavily obscured. Wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise lasts for 1 minute.

Innate Spellcasting (1/Day). The mephit can innately cast dancing lights, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

Ações

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 4 (1d4 + 2) de dano cortante.

Cinder Breath (Recarrega 6). The mephit exhales a cone de 4,5 metros of smoldering ash. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 10 (Destreza) or be blinded until the end of the mephit's next turn.

[ Solar ]
Large celestial, leal e Bom
Classe de Armadura 21 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 243 (18d10 + 144)
Deslocamento 15 mt., Voo 45 mt.
FOR
26 (+8)
DES
22 (+6)
CON
26 (+8)
INT
25 (+7)
SAB
25 (+7)
CAR
30 (+10)
Testes de Resistência Int +14, Sab +14, Car +17
Perícias Percepção +14
Resistência a Dano radiant; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano necrótico, veneno
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, exausto, amedrontado, envenenado
Sentidos Visão verdadeira 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 24
Idiomas all, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 21 (33000 XP)

Angelic Weapons. The solar's weapon attacks are magical. When the solar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 6d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

Divine Awareness. The solar knows if it hears a lie.

Innate Spellcasting. The solar's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 25). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect evil and good, invisibility (self only)
3/day each: blade barrier, dispel evil and good, resurrection
1/day each: commune, control weather

Resistência à Magia. The solar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The solar makes two greatsword attacks.

Greatsword. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +15 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 22 (4d6 + 8) slashing damage plus 27 (6d8) radiant damage.

Slaying Longbow. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +13 para atingir, distância 150/600 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 15 (2d8 + 6) de dano perfurante mais 27 (6d8) radiant damage. If the target is a creature that has 100 Pontos de Vida or fewer, it must succeed on a CD 15 (Constituição) ou die.

Flying Sword. The solar releases its greatsword to hover magically in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. If the solar can see the sword, the solar can mentally command it as a bonus action to fly up to 50 feet and either make one attack against a target or return to the solar's hands. If the hovering sword is targeted by any effect, the solar is considered to be holding it. The hovering sword falls if the solar dies.

Healing Touch (4/Dia). The solar touches another creature. The target magically regains 40 (8d8 + 4) Pontos de Vida and is freed from any curse, disease, veneno, blindness, ou deafness.

AÇÕES LENDÁRIAS

The solar can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The solar regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Teletransporte. The solar magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Searing Burst (Custa 2 Ações). The solar emits magical, divine energy. Each creature of its choice in a 10-foot radius must make a CD 23 (Destreza), sofrendo 14 (4d6) fire damage plus 14 (4d6) radiant damage se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

Blinding Gaze (Custa 3 Ações). The solar targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see it, the target must succeed on a CD 15 (Constituição) ou be blinded until magic such as the lesser restoration spell removes the blindness.

[ Spectateur ]
Medium aberration, leal e Neutro
Classe de Armadura 14 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 39 (6d8 + 12)
Deslocamento 0 mt., Voo 9 mt. (planar)
FOR
8 (-1)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
14 (+2)
INT
13 (+1)
SAB
14 (+2)
CAR
11 (+0)
Perícias Percepção +6
Imunidade a Condição caído
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 16
Idiomas Dialeto Subterrâneo, Undercommon, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 3 (700 XP)
Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +1 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 2 (1d6 - 1) de dano perfurante.

Eye Rays. The spectator shoots up to two of the following magical eye rays at one or two creatures it can see within 90 feet of it. It can use each ray only once on a turn.

1- Confusion Ray. The target must succeed on a CD 13 Wisdom saving throw, ou it can't take reactions until the end of its next turn. On its turn, the target can't move, and it uses its action to make a melee or ranged attack against a randomly determined creature within range. If the target can't attack, it does nothing on its turn.

2- Paralyzing Ray. The target must succeed on a CD 13 (Constituição) ou ficará paralisada por 1 minuto. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

3- Fear Ray. The target must succeed on a CD 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the spectator is visible to the target, ending the effect on itself on a success.

4- Wounding Ray. The target must make a CD 13 (Constituição), sofrendo 16 (3d10) necrotic damage se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

Create Food and Water. The spectator magically creates enough food and water to sustain itself for 24 hours.

REACTIONS

Spell Reflection. If the spectator makes a successful saving throw against a spell, ou a spell attack misses it, the spectator can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 30 feet of it. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the spectator. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

A spectator is a lesser type of beholder-a foul and deadly aberration. It resembles a floating sphere with a gaping maw and a single great eye, set within four eyestalks that shoot forth deadly rays.
[ Spectre ]
Medium undead, Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 22 (5d8)
Deslocamento 0 mt., Voo 15 mt. (planar)
FOR
1 (-5)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
11 (+0)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
11 (+0)
Resistência a Dano ácido, frio, fogo, lightning, trovejante; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano necrótico, veneno
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, exausto, agarrado, paralisado, petrificado, envenenado, caído, impedido, inconsciente
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas understands the Idiomas it knew in life but can't speak
Nível de Desafio 1 (200 XP)

Incorporeal Movement. The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the specter has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Ações

Life Drain. Melee Spell Attack: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a CD 10 (Constituição) ou its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

Sentidos Visão no escuro 9 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 0 (10 XP)

Spider Climb. The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Web Sense. While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

Web Walker. The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a CD 9 (Constituição) ou take 2 (1d4) de dano de veneno.

[ Naga corrupteur ]
Large monstrosity, Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 15 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 75 (10d10 + 20)
Deslocamento 12 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
17 (+3)
CON
14 (+2)
INT
16 (+3)
SAB
15 (+2)
CAR
16 (+3)
Testes de Resistência Des +6, Con +5, Sab +5, Car +6
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas Abyssal, Common
Nível de Desafio 8 (3900 XP)

Rejuvenation. If it dies, the naga returns to life in 1d6 days and regains all its Pontos de Vida. Only a wish spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

Conjuração. The naga is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save CD 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks), and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. It has the following wizard spells prepared:

Truques (à vontade): mage hand, minor illusion, ray of frost
1° nível (4 espaços): charm person, detect magic, sleep
2° nível (3 espaços): detect thoughts, hold person
3° nível (3 espaços): lightning bolt, water breathing
4° nível (3 espaços): bluz, dimension door
5° nível (2 espaços): dominate person
Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., one creature. Acerto: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a CD 13 (Constituição), sofrendo 31 (7d8) de dano de veneno se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Esprit follet ]
Tiny fey, Neutro e Bom
Classe de Armadura 15 (leather armor)
Pontos de Vida 2 (1d4)
Deslocamento 3 mt., Voo 12 mt.
FOR

DES
18 (+4)
CON
10 (+0)
INT
14 (+2)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
11 (+0)
Perícias Percepção +3, Furtividade +8
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas Comum, Elvish, Sylvan
Nível de Desafio 1/4 (50 XP)
Ações

Espada Longa. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +2 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 1 de dano cortante.

Shortbow. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +6 para atingir, distância 40/118 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a CD 10 (Constituição) ou become envenenado for 1 minute. If its saving throw result is 5 or lower, the envenenado target falls unconscious for the same duration, ou until it takes damage or another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

Heart Sight. The sprite touches a creature and magically knows the creature's current emotional state. If the target fails a CD 10 Charisma saving throw, the sprite also knows the creature's alignment. Celestials, fiends, and undead automatically fail the saving throw.

Invisibility. The sprite magically turns invisible until it attacks or casts a spell, ou until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the sprite wears or carries is invisible with it.

[ Espion ]
Humanóide Médio (qualquer raça), qualquer tendência
Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 27 (6d8)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
10 (+0)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
10 (+0)
INT
12 (+1)
SAB
14 (+2)
CAR
16 (+3)
Perícias Enganação +5, Intuição +4, Investigation +5, Percepção +6, Persuasão +5, Sleight of Hand +4, Furtividade +4
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 16
Idiomas any two Idiomas
Nível de Desafio 1 (200 XP)

Cunning Action. On each of its turns, the spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, ou Hide action.

Sneak Attack (1/Turn). The spy deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, ou when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy that isn't incapacitated and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The spy makes two melee attacks.

Shortsword. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Hand Crossbow. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, distância 30/16 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Rulers, nobles, merchants, guildmasters, and other wealthy individuals use spies to gain the upper hand in a world of cutthroat politics. A spy is trained to secretly gather information. Loyal spies would rather die than divulge information that could compromise them or their employers.
[ Méphite de vapeur ]
Small elemental, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 10
Pontos de Vida 21 (6d6)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 9 mt.
FOR
5 (-3)
DES
11 (+0)
CON
10 (+0)
INT
11 (+0)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
12 (+1)
Imunidade a Dano fogo, veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Aquan, Ignan
Nível de Desafio 1/4 (50 XP)

Death Burst. When the mephit dies, it explodes in a cloud of steam. Each creature within 5 feet of the mephit must succeed on a CD 10 (Destreza) ou sofrerá 4 (1d8) de dano de fogo.

Innate Spellcasting (1/Day). The mephit can innately cast blur, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

Ações

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +2 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 2 (1d4) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) de dano de fogo.

Steam Breath (Recarrega 6). The mephit exhales a cone de 4,5 metros of scalding steam. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 10 (Destreza), sofrendo 4 (1d8) de dano de fogo se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Stirge ]
Tiny beast, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 14 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 2 (1d4)
Deslocamento 3 mt., Voo 12 mt.
FOR
4 (-3)
DES
16 (+3)
CON
11 (+0)
INT
2 (-4)
SAB
8 (-1)
CAR
6 (-2)
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 9
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 1/8 (25 XP)
Ações

Blood Drain. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the stirge attaches to the target. While attached, the stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the stirge's turns, the target loses 5 (1d4 + 3) Pontos de Vida due to blood loss. The stirge can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. It does so after it drains 10 Pontos de Vida of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the stirge.

This horrid monster looks like a cross between a large bat and an oversized mosquito. Its legs end in sharp pincers, and its long, needle-like proboscis slashes the air as it seeks to feed on the blood of living creatures.
[ Géant des pierres ]
Huge giant, Neutro
Classe de Armadura 17 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 126 (11d12 + 55)
Deslocamento 12 mt.
FOR
23 (+6)
DES

Perícias Athletics +12, Percepção +4
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Giant
Nível de Desafio 7 (2900 XP)

Stone Camouflage. The giant has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The giant makes two greatclub attacks.

Greatclub. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +9 para atingir, alcance 4.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 19 (3d8 + 6) de dano de concussão.

Rock. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +9 para atingir, distância 60/212 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 28 (4d10 + 6) de dano de concussão. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 17 (Força) para não cair no chão.

REACTIONS

Rock Catching. If a rock or similar object is hurled at the giant, the giant can, with a successful CD 10 (Destreza), catch the missile and take no bludgeoning damage from it.

Stone giants are reclusive, quiet, and peaceful as long as they are left alone.
[ Golem de pierre ]
Large construct, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 17 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 178 (17d10 + 85)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
22 (+6)
DES
9 (-1)
CON
20 (+5)
INT
3 (-4)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
1 (-5)
Imunidade a Dano veneno, psychic; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos que não sejam de adamante
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, exausto, amedrontado, paralisado, petrificado, envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas understands the Idiomas of its creator but can't speak
Nível de Desafio 10 (5900 XP)

Immutable Form. The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Resistência à Magia. The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Armas Mágicas. The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The golem makes two slam attacks.

Pancada. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +10 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 19 (3d8 + 6) de dano de concussão.

Slow (Recarrega 5–6). The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 3 metros of it. Each target must make a CD 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its Deslocamento is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Stone golems are magical constructs cut and chiseled from stone to appear as tall, impressive statues. Like other golems, they are nearly impervious to spells and ordinary weapons.
[ Géant des tempêtes ]
Huge giant, Caótico e Bom

Resistência a Dano frio
Imunidade a Dano elétrico, thunder
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 19
Idiomas Comum, Giant
Nível de Desafio 13 (10000 XP)

Anfíbio. The giant can breathe air and water.

Innate Spellcasting. The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect magic, feather fall, levitate, light
3/day each: control weather, water breathing
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The giant makes two greatsword attacks.

Greatsword. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +14 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 30 (6d6 + 9) de dano cortante.

Rock. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +14 para atingir, distância 60/212 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 35 (4d12 + 9) de dano de concussão.

Lightning Strike (Recarrega 5–6). The giant hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 3 metros of that point must make a CD 17 (Destreza), sofrendo 54 (12d8) lightning damage se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

Storm giants are contemplative seers that live in places far removed from mortal civilization.
[ Succube ]
Medium fiend (shapechanger), Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 15 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 66 (12d8 + 12)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 18 mt.
FOR
8 (-1)
DES
17 (+3)
CON
13 (+1)
INT
15 (+2)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
20 (+5)
Perícias Enganação +9, Intuição +5, Percepção +5, Persuasão +9, Furtividade +7
Resistência a Dano frio, fogo, lightning, veneno; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 15
Idiomas Abyssal, Comum, Infernal, Telepatia 18 mt.
Nível de Desafio 4 (1100 XP)

Telepathic Bond. The fiend ignores the range restriction on its Telepatia when communicating with a creature it has charmed. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

Shapechanger. The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Humanóide Médio, ou back into its true form. Without wings, the fiend loses its flying Deslocamento. Other than its size and Deslocamento, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Ações

Claw (Fiend Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano cortante.

Charm. One humanoid the fiend can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a CD 15 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed for 1 day. The charmed target obeys the fiend's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, ou if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours. The fiend can have only one target charmed at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

Draining Kiss. The fiend kisses a creature charmed by it or a willing creature. The target must make a CD 15 Constitution saving throw against this magic, sofrendo 32 (5d10 + 5) psychic damage se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

Etherealness. The fiend magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, ou vice versa.

[ Nuée de chauves-souris ]

Sentidos Percepção às cegas 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 1/4 (50 XP)

Echolocation. The swarm can't use its Percepção às cegas while deafened.

Keen Hearing. The swarm has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on hearing.

Swarm. The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny bat. The swarm can't regain Pontos de Vida or gain temporary Pontos de Vida.

Ações

Bites. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 0 mt., one creature in the swarm's space. Acerto: 5 (2d4) piercing damage, ou 2 (1d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its Pontos de Vida or fewer.

Blood Frenzy. The swarm has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its Pontos de Vida.

Swarm. The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny quipper. The swarm can't regain Pontos de Vida or gain temporary Pontos de Vida.

Water Breathing. The swarm can breathe only underwater.

[ Tarasque ]
Gargantuan monstrosity (titan), Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 25 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 676 (33d20 + 330)
Deslocamento 12 mt.
FOR
30 (+10)
DES
11 (+0)
CON
30 (+10)
INT
3 (-4)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
11 (+0)
Testes de Resistência Int +5, Sab +9, Car +9
Imunidade a Dano fogo, veneno; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, amedrontado, paralisado, envenenado
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 30 (155000 XP)

Resistência Lendária (3/Dia). If the tarrasque fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Resistência à Magia. The tarrasque has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Reflective Carapace. Any time the tarrasque is targeted by a magic missile spell, a line spell, ou a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a d6. On a 1 to 5, the tarrasque is unaffected. On a 6, the tarrasque is unaffected, and the effect is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the tarrasque, turning the caster into the target.

Siege Monster. The tarrasque deals double damage to objects and structures.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The tarrasque can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes five attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, one with its horns, and one with its tail. It can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +19 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 36 (4d12 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape CD 20). Until this grapple ends, the target is impedido, and the tarrasque can't bite another target.

Garra. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +19 para atingir, alcance 4.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 28 (4d8 + 10) stashing damage.

Horns. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +19 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 32 (4d10 + 10) de dano perfurante.

Cauda. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +19 para atingir, alcance 6 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 24 (4d6 + 10) de dano de concussão. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 20 (Força) para não cair no chão.

Presença Aterradora. Each creature of the tarrasque's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a CD 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the tarrasque is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw Is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the tarrasque's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

Swallow. The tarrasque makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and impedido, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the tarrasque, and it takes bO (I6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the tarrasque's turns. If the tarrasque takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the tarrasque must succeed on a CD 30 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 3 metros of the tarrasque. If the tarrasque dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting prone.

AÇÕES LENDÁRIAS

The tarrasque can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The tarrasque regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Attack. The tarrasque makes one claw attack or tail attack.

Move. The tarrasque moves up to half its Deslocamento.

Chomp (Custa 2 Ações). The tarrasque makes one bite attack or uses its Swallow.

The legendary tarrasque is possibly the most dreaded monster of the Material Plane. It is widely believed that only one of these creatures exists, though no one can predict where and when it will strike. A scaly biped, the tarrasque is fifty feet tall and seventy feet long, weighing hundreds of tons. It carries itself like a bird of prey, leaning forward and using its powerful lashing tail for balance.

Pack Tactics. The thug has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The thug makes two melee attacks.

Mace. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) de dano de concussão.

Heavy Crossbow. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +2 para atingir, distância 100/400 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d10) de dano perfurante.

Thugs are ruthless enforcers skilled at intimidation and violence. They work for money and have few scruples.

Keen Smell. The tiger has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on smell.

Bote. If the tiger moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a CD 13 (Força) para não cair no chão. If the target is caído, the tiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 8 (1d10 + 3) de dano perfurante.

Garra. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d8 + 3) de dano cortante.

[ Sylvanien ]

Classe de Armadura 16 (armadura natural)

Idiomas Comum, Druidic, Elvish, Sylvan

False Appearance. While the treant remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

Siege Monster. The treant deals double damage to objects and structures.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The treant makes two slam attacks.

Pancada. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +10 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 16 (3d6 + 6) de dano de concussão.

Rock. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +10 para atingir, distância 60/124 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 28 (4d10 + 6) de dano de concussão.

Animate Trees (1/Day). The treant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the treant. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the treant dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the treant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

Pack Tactics. The warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Ações

Spear. Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +3 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 20/18 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, ou 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Tribal warriors live beyond civilization, most often subsisting on fishing and hunting. Each tribe acts in accordance with the wishes of its chief, who is the greatest or oldest warrior of the tribe or a tribe member blessed by the gods.
[ Tricératops ]

Trampling Charge. If the triceratops moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a CD 13 (Força) para não cair no chão. If the target is caído, the triceratops can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

One of the most aggressive of the herbivorous dinosaurs, a triceratops possesses great horns and formidable Deslocamento, which it uses to gore and trample would-be predators to death.

Chameleon Skin. The troglodyte has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

Stench. Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte must succeed on a CD 12 (Constituição) ou be envenenado until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Ações

Keen Smell. The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on smell.

Regeneration. The troll regains 10 Pontos de Vida at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Pontos de Vida and doesn't regenerate.

Ações

Fearsome green-skinned giants, trolls eat anything they can catch and devour. Only acid and fire can arrest the regenerative properties of a troll's flesh.
[ Buisson infecté ]

Damage vulnerabilities fogo
Imunidade a Condição blinded, deafened
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 18 mt. (blind beyond this radius), Percepção Passiva 9
Idiomas understands Common but can't speak
Nível de Desafio 1/8 (25 XP)

False Appearance. While the blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a dead shrub.

A twig blight is an awakened plant that resembles a woody shrub that can pull its roots free of the ground. Its branches twist together to form a humanoid-looking body with a head and limbs.
[ Tyrannosaure ]

Ataques Múltiplos. The tyrannosaurus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +10 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 33 (4d12 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape CD 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is impedido, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.

Cauda. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +10 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 20 (3d8 + 7) de dano de concussão.

This enormous predatory dinosaur terrorizes all other creatures in its territory. It chases anything it thinks it can eat, and there are few creatures it won't try to devour whole.

[ Mastodonte des ombres ]
Large monstrosity, Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 18 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 93 (11d10 + 33)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Escavação 6 mt.
FOR
20 (+5)
DES
13 (+1)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
9 (-1)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
10 (+0)
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., tremorsense 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Umber Hulk
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Confusing Caze. When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the umber hulk and is able to see the umber hulk's eyes, the umber hulk can magically force it to make a CD 15 Charisma saving throw, unless the umber hulk is incapacitated. On a failed saving throw, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a d8 to determine what it does during that turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action but uses all its movement to move in a random direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes one melee attack against a random creature, ou it does nothing if no creature is within reach. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the umber hulk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the umber hulk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

Tunneler. The umber hulk can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing Deslocamento and leaves a 5 foot-wide, 8-foot-high tunnel in its wake.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The umber hulk makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its mandibles.

Garra. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +8 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 9 (1d8 + 5) de dano cortante.

Mandibles. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +8 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 14 (2d8 + 5) de dano cortante.

[ Licorne ]
Large celestial, leal e Bom
Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 67 (9d10 + 18)
Deslocamento 15 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
15 (+2)
INT
11 (+0)
SAB
17 (+3)
CAR
16 (+3)
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, paralisado, envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas Celestial, Elvish, Sylvan, Telepatia 18 mt.
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Charge. If the unicorn moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 15 (Força) para não cair no chão.

Innate Spellcasting. The unicorn's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save CD 14). The unicorn can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

At will: detect evil and good, druidcraft, pass without trace
1/day each: calm emotions, dispel evil and good, entangle

Resistência à Magia. The unicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Armas Mágicas. The unicorn's weapon attacks are magical.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The unicorn makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its horn.

Hooves. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d6 + 4) de dano de concussão.

Horn. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 8 (1d8 + 4) de dano perfurante.

Healing Touch (3/Dia). The unicorn touches another creature with its horn. The target magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) Pontos de Vida. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

Teleport (1/Day). The unicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 feet of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the unicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

AÇÕES LENDÁRIAS

The unicorn can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The unicorn regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Hooves. The unicorn makes one attack with its hooves.

Shimmering Shield (Custa 2 Ações). The unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's next turn.

Heal Self (Custa 3 Ações). The unicorn magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) Pontos de Vida.

[ Vampire ]
Medium undead (shapechanger), Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 16 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 144 (17d8 + 68)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
18 (+4)
CON
18 (+4)
INT
17 (+3)
SAB
15 (+2)
CAR
18 (+4)
Testes de Resistência Des +9, Sab +7, Car +9
Perícias Percepção +7, Furtividade +9
Resistência a Dano necrótico; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 17
Idiomas the Idiomas it knew in life
Nível de Desafio 13 (10000 XP)

Shapechanger. If the vampire isn't in sunlight or running water, it can use its action to polymorph into a Tiny bat or a Medium cloud of mist, ou back into its true form. While in bat form, the vampire can't speak, its walking Deslocamento is 5 feet, and it has a flying Deslocamento of 30 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and Deslocamento, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies. While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, ou manipulate objects. It is weightless, has a flying Deslocamento of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

Resistência Lendária (3/Dia). If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Misty Escape. When it drops to 0 Pontos de Vida outside its resting place, the vampire transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed. While it has 0 Pontos de Vida in mist form, it can't revert to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its vampire form. It is then paralyzed until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 Pontos de Vida, it regains 1 hit point.

Regeneration. The vampire regains 20 Pontos de Vida at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

Spider Climb. The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Vampire Weaknesses. The vampire has the following flaws:

Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

Harmed by Running Water. The vampire takes 20 acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is paralyzed until the stake is removed.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Ações

Multiattack (Vampire Form Only). The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +9 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 8 (1d8 + 4) de dano de concussão. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape CD 18).

Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +9 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one willing creature, ou a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, ou restrained. Acerto: 7 (1d6 + 4) de dano perfurante mais 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Pontos de Vida equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a vampire spawn under the vampire's control.

Charm. The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a CD 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed by the vampire. The charmed target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the vampire's control, it takes the vampire's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the vampire's bit attack. Each time the vampire or the vampire's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, ou takes a bonus action to end the effect.

Children ofthe Night (1/Day). The vampire magically calls 2d4 swarms of bats or rats, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, the vampire can call 3d6 wolves instead. The called creatures arrive in 1d4 rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, ou until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

AÇÕES LENDÁRIAS

The vampire can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The vampire regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Move. The vampire moves up to its Deslocamento without provoking opportunity attacks.

Unarmed Strike. The vampire makes one unarmed strike.

Bite (Custa 2 Ações). The vampire makes one bite attack.

[ Vampirien ]
Medium undead, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 15 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 82 (11d8 + 33)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
16 (+3)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
11 (+0)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
12 (+1)
Testes de Resistência Des +6, Sab +3
Perícias Percepção +3, Furtividade +6
Resistência a Dano necrótico; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas the Idiomas it knew in life
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Regeneration. The vampire regains 10 Pontos de Vida at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

Spider Climb. The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Vampire Weaknesses. The vampire has the following flaws:

Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

Harmed by Running Water. The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it ends its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is incapacitated in its resting place.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

Claws. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape CD 13).

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one willing creature, ou a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, ou restrained. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano perfurante mais 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Pontos de Vida equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

[ Vétéran ]
Humanóide Médio (qualquer raça), qualquer tendência
Classe de Armadura 17 (splint)
Pontos de Vida 58 (9d8 + 18)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
16 (+3)
DES
13 (+1)
CON
14 (+2)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
10 (+0)
Perícias Athletics +5, Percepção +2
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas um idioma qualquer (geralmente Comum)
Nível de Desafio 3 (700 XP)
Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

Espada Longa. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, ou 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Shortsword. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano perfurante.

Heavy Crossbow. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +3 para atingir, distância 100/400 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d10 + 1) de dano perfurante.

Veterans are professional fighters that take up arms for pay or to protect something they believe in or value. Their ranks include soldiers retired from long service and warriors who never served anyone but themselves.
[ Lierre infecté ]

Pontos de Vida 26 (4d8 + 8)
Deslocamento 3 mt.

Idiomas Comum
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

As informações completas dessa criatura ainda não estão disponíveis.

[ Moisissure violette ]
Medium plant, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 5
Pontos de Vida 18 (4d8)
Deslocamento 1.5 mt.
FOR
3 (-4)
DES
1 (-5)
CON
10 (+0)
INT
1 (-5)
SAB
3 (-4)
CAR
1 (-5)
Imunidade a Condição blinded, deafened, amedrontado
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 9 mt. (blind beyond this radius), Percepção Passiva 6
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 1/4 (50 XP)

False Appearance. While the violet fungus remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The fungus makes 1d4 Rotting Touch attacks.

Rotting Touch. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +2 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., one creature. Acerto: 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

[ Vrock ]
Large fiend (demônio), Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 15 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 104 (11d10 + 44)
Deslocamento 12 mt., Voo 18 mt.
FOR
17 (+3)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
18 (+4)
INT
8 (-1)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
8 (-1)
Testes de Resistência Des +5, Sab +4, Car +2
Resistência a Dano frio, fogo, lightning; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas Abyssal, Telepatia 16 mt.
Nível de Desafio 6 (2300 XP)

Resistência à Magia. The vrock has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The vrock makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

Beak. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (2d6 + 3) de dano perfurante.

Talons. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 14 (2d10 + 3) de dano cortante.

Spores (Recarrega 6). A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the vrock. The spores spread around corners. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 14 (Constituição) ou become envenenado. While envenenado in this way, a target takes 5 (1d10) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself

on a success. Emptying a vial of holy water on the target also ends the effect on it.

Stunning Screech (1/Day). The vrock emits a horrific screech. Each creature within 20 feet of it that can hear it and that isn't a demon must succeed on a CD 14 (Constituição) ou be stunned until the end of the vrock's next turn.

[ Vautour ]
Besta Média, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 10
Pontos de Vida 5 (1d8 + 1)
Deslocamento 3 mt., Voo 15 mt.
FOR
7 (-2)
DES
10 (+0)
CON

12 (+1)
CAR
4 (-3)
Perícias Percepção +3
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 0 (10 XP)

Keen Sight and Smell. The vulture has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight or smell.

Pack Tactics. The vulture has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Ações

Beak. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +2 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 2 (1d4) de dano perfurante.

[ Cheval de guerre ]
Besta Grande, Imparcial
Classe de Armadura 11
Pontos de Vida 19 (3d10 + 3)
Deslocamento 18 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
12 (+1)
CON
13 (+1)
INT
2 (-4)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
7 (-2)
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 11
Idiomas -
Nível de Desafio 1/2 (100 XP)

Trampling Charge. If the horse moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a CD 14 (Força) para não cair no chão. If the target is caído, the horse can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

Ações

Hooves. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d6 + 4) de dano de concussão.

[ Élémentaire de l'eau ]
Elemental Grande, Neutro
Classe de Armadura 14 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 114 (12d10 + 48)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Natação 27 mt.
FOR
18 (+4)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
18 (+4)
INT
5 (-3)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
8 (-1)
Resistência a Dano ácido; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição exausto, agarrado, paralisado, petrificado, envenenado, caído, impedido, inconsciente
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas Aquan
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Water Form. The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

Freeze. If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its Deslocamento is reduced by 20 feet until the end of its next turn.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. O elemental realiza dois ataques de pancada.

Pancada. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 13 (2d8 + 4) de dano de concussão.

Whelm (Recarrega 4–6). Cada criatura no espaço do elemental deve realizar um teste de resistência de CD 15 (Força). Se falhar, um alvo sofre 13 (2d8 + 4) de dano de concussão. If it is Large or smaller, it is also grappled (escape CD 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space. The elemental can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at one time. At the start of each of the elemental's turns, each target grappled by it takes 13 (2d8 + 4) de dano de concussão. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a CD 14 Strength check and succeeding.

Beings native to the Elemental Plane of Water and summoned to the world, water elementals resemble cresting waves that roll across the ground. A water elemental engulfs any creatures that stand against it.
[ Sentinelle d'eau ]
Elemental Grande, Neutro
Classe de Armadura 13
Pontos de Vida 58 (9d10 + 9)
Deslocamento 0 mt., Natação 18 mt.
FOR
17 (+3)
DES
16 (+3)
CON
13 (+1)
INT
11 (+0)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
10 (+0)
Resistência a Dano fogo; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição exausto, agarrado, paralisado, envenenado, impedido, caído, inconsciente
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 9 mt., Percepção Passiva 10
Idiomas understands Aquan but doesn't speak
Nível de Desafio 3 (700 XP)

Invisible in Water. The water weird is invisible while fully immersed in water.

Water Bound. The water weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

Ações

Constrict. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 3 mt., one creature. Acerto: 13 (3d6 + 3) de dano de concussão. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape CD 13) and pulled 5 feet toward the water weird. Until this grapple ends, the target is impedido, the water weird tries to drown it, and the water weird can't constrict another target.

3 (-4)
DES
16 (+3)

Keen Hearing and Smell. The weasel has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 1 de dano perfurante.

[ Ours-garou ]
Humanóide Médio (human, shapechanger), Neutro e Bom
Classe de Armadura 10 in humanoid form, 11 (armadura natural) in bear and hybrid form
Pontos de Vida 135 (18d8 + 54)
Deslocamento 9 mt. (12 mt., Escalada 9 mt. in bear or hybrid form)
FOR
19 (+4)
DES
10 (+0)
CON
17 (+3)
INT
11 (+0)
SAB
12 (+1)
CAR
12 (+1)
Perícias Percepção +7
Imunidade a Dano concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos not made with silvered weapons
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 17
Idiomas Comum (can't speak in bear form)
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Shapechanger. The werebear can use its action to polymorph into a Large bear-humanoid hybrid or into a Large bear, ou back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size and AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Keen Smell. The werebear has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on smell.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. In bear form, the werebear makes two claw attacks. In humanoid form, it makes two greataxe attacks. In hybrid form, it can attack like a bear or a humanoid.

Bite (Bear or Hybrid Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a CD 14 (Constituição) ou be cursed with werebear lycanthropy.

Claw (Bear or Hybrid Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 13 (2d8 + 4) de dano cortante.

Greataxe (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +7 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (1d12 + 4) de dano cortante.

[ Sanglier-garou ]
Humanóide Médio (human, shapechanger), Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 10 in humanoid form, 11 (armadura natural) in boar or hybrid form
Pontos de Vida 78 (12d8 + 24)
Deslocamento 9 mt. (12 mt. in boar form)
FOR
17 (+3)
DES
10 (+0)
CON
15 (+2)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
8 (-1)
Perícias Percepção +2
Imunidade a Dano concussão, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas Comum (can't speak in boar form)
Nível de Desafio 4 (1100 XP)

Shapechanger. The wereboar can use its action to polymorph into a boar-humanoid hybrid or into a boar, ou back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Charge (Boar or Hybrid Form Only). If the wereboar moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its tusks on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) slashing damage. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 13 (Força) para não cair no chão.

Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest). If the wereboar takes 14 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 Pontos de Vida, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

Ações

Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only). The wereboar makes two attacks, only one of which can be with its tusks.

Maul (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (2d6 + 3) de dano de concussão.

Tusks (Boar or Hybrid Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a CD 12 (Constituição) ou be cursed with wereboar lycanthropy.

[ Rat-garou ]
Humanóide Médio (human, shapechanger), Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 33 (6d8 + 6)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
10 (+0)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
12 (+1)
INT
11 (+0)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
8 (-1)
Perícias Percepção +2, Furtividade +4
Imunidade a Dano concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos not made with silvered weapons
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt. (rat form only), Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas Comum (can't speak in rat form)
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Shapechanger. The wererat can use its action to polymorph into a rat-humanoid hybrid or into a giant rat, ou back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Keen Smell. The wererat has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on smell.

Ações

Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only). The wererat makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite.

Bite (Rat or Hybrid Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a CD 11 (Constituição) ou be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.

Shortsword (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only). Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, distância 30/16 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) de dano perfurante.

[ Tigre-garou ]
Humanóide Médio (human, shapechanger), Neutro
Classe de Armadura 12
Pontos de Vida 120 (16d8 + 48)
Deslocamento 9 mt. (12 mt. in tiger form)
FOR
17 (+3)
DES
15 (+2)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
11 (+0)
Perícias Percepção +5, Furtividade +4
Imunidade a Dano concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos not made with silvered weapons
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 15
Idiomas Comum (can't speak in tiger form)
Nível de Desafio 4 (1100 XP)

Shapechanger. The weretiger can use its action to polymorph into a tiger-humanoid hybrid or into a tiger, ou back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Keen Hearing and Smell. The weretiger has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

Pounce (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only). If the weretiger moves at least 15 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a CD 14 (Força) para não cair no chão. If the target is caído, the weretiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

Ações

Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only). In humanoid form, the weretiger makes two scimitar attacks or two longbow attacks. In hybrid form, it can attack like a humanoid or make two claw attacks.

Bite (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a CD 13 (Constituição) ou be cursed with weretiger lycanthropy.

Claw (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d8 + 3) de dano cortante.

Scimitar (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano cortante.

Longbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only). Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, distância 150/600 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d8 + 2) de dano perfurante.

[ Loup-garou ]
Humanóide Médio (human, shapechanger), Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 11 in humanoid form, 12 (armadura natural) in wolf or hybrid form
Pontos de Vida 58 (9d8 + 18)
Deslocamento 9 mt. (12 mt. in wolf form)
FOR
15 (+2)
DES
13 (+1)
CON
14 (+2)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
11 (+0)
CAR
10 (+0)
Perícias Percepção +4, Furtividade +3
Imunidade a Dano concussão, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Comum (can't speak in wolf form)
Nível de Desafio 3 (700 XP)

Shapechanger. The werewolf can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, ou back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Keen Hearing and Smell. The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

Ações

Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only). The werewolf makes two attacks: two with its spear (humanoid form) or one with its bite and one with its claws (hybrid form).

Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a CD 12 (Constituição) ou be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

Claws (Hybrid Form Only). Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 7 (2d4 + 2) de dano cortante.

Spear (Humanoid Form Only). Melee or Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt. or range 20/18 mt., one creature. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, ou 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

A werewolf is a savage predator that can appear as a humanoid, as a wolf, ou in a terrifying hybrid form-a furred and well-muscled humanoid body topped by a ravening wolf's head.
[ Dragon blanc, nouveau-né ]
Dragão Médio, Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 16 (armadura natural)
Pontos de Vida 32 (5d8 + 10)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Escavação 4.5 mt., Voo 18 mt., Natação 9 mt.

14 (+2)
DES

CON
14 (+2)
INT
5 (-3)
SAB
10 (+0)
CAR
11 (+0)

Perícias Percepção +4, Furtividade +2
Imunidade a Dano frio
Sentidos Percepção às cegas 3 mt., Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 14
Idiomas Dracônico
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)
Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 7 (1d10 + 2) de dano perfurante mais 2 (1d4) de dano de frio.

Sopro Congelante (Recarrega 5–6). The dragon exhales an icy blast of hail in a cone de 4,5 metros. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 12 (Constituição), sofrendo 22 (5d8) de dano de frio se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

[ Nécrophage ]
Medium undead, Neutro e mau
Classe de Armadura 14 (studded leather)
Pontos de Vida 45 (6d8 + 18)
Deslocamento 9 mt.
FOR
15 (+2)
DES
14 (+2)
CON
16 (+3)
INT
10 (+0)
SAB
13 (+1)
CAR
15 (+2)
Perícias Percepção +3, Furtividade +4
Resistência a Dano necrótico; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos that aren't silvered
Imunidade a Dano veneno
Imunidade a Condição exausto, envenenado
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 13
Idiomas the Idiomas it knew in life
Nível de Desafio 3 (700 XP)

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Ações

Ataques Múltiplos. The wight makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

Life Drain. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 5 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a CD 13 (Constituição) ou its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the wight's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

Espada Longa. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, ou 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Longbow. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +4 para atingir, distância 150/600 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 6 (1d8 + 2) de dano perfurante.

Wights are intelligent undead humanoids that resemble armed and armored corpses. They never tire in pursuit of their goal of making eternal war against the living.
[ Feu follet ]
Tiny undead, Caótico e Mau
Classe de Armadura 19
Pontos de Vida 22 (9d4)
Deslocamento 0 mt., Voo 15 mt. (planar)
FOR
1 (-5)
DES
28 (+9)
CON
10 (+0)
INT
13 (+1)
SAB
14 (+2)
CAR
11 (+0)
Imunidade a Dano elétrico, veneno
Resistência a Dano ácido, frio, fogo, necrotic, trovejante; concussão, cortante e perfurante de ataques não-mágicos
Imunidade a Condição exausto, agarrado, paralisado, envenenado, caído, impedido, inconsciente
Sentidos Visão no escuro 16 mt., Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas the Idiomas it knew in life
Nível de Desafio 2 (450 XP)

Consume Life. As a bonus action, the will-o'-wisp can target one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that has 0 Pontos de Vida and is still alive. The target must succeed on a CD 10 Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 (3d6) Pontos de Vida.

Ephemeral. The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.

Incorporeal Movement. The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Variable Illumination. The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5-to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.

Ações

Shock. Melee Spell Attack: +4 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 9 (2d8) de dano elétrico.

Invisibility. The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become invisible until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, ou until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

[ Kobold ailé ]
Small humanoid (kobold), Leal e Mau
Classe de Armadura 13
Pontos de Vida 7 (3d6 - 3)
Deslocamento 9 mt., Voo 9 mt.
FOR

CAR

Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 8
Idiomas Comum, Dracônico
Nível de Desafio 1/4 (50 XP)

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Pack Tactics. The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Ações

Dagger. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +5 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 5 (1d4 + 3) de dano perfurante.

Dropped Rock. Ataque à Distânciacom Arma: +5 para atingir, one target directly below the kobold. Acerto: 6 (1d6 + 3) de dano de concussão.

Perícias Percepção +5, Furtividade +3
Imunidade a Dano frio
Sentidos Percepção Passiva 15
Idiomas Comum, Giant, Winter Wolf
Nível de Desafio 3 (700 XP)

Keen Hearing and Smell. The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

Pack Tactics. The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Snow Camouflage. The wolf has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

Ações

Mordida. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., um alvo. Acerto: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. Se o alvo foruma criatura, ele deve ser bem sucedido num teste de resistência de CD 14 (Força) para não cair no chão.

Sopro Congelante (Recarrega 5–6). The wolf exhales a blast of freezing wind in a cone de 4,5 metros. Cada criatura na área deve ser bem sucedida num teste de resistência de CD 12 (Destreza), sofrendo 18 (4d8) de dano de frio se falhar na resistência, ou metade desse dano caso obtenha sucesso.

Arctic-dwelling winter wolves are evil and intelligent creatures with snow-white fur and pale blue eyes.

Imunidade a Condição enfeitiçado, exausto, agarrado, paralisado, petrificado, envenenado, caído, restrained
Sentidos Visão no escuro 18 mt., Percepção Passiva 12
Idiomas the Idiomas it knew in life
Nível de Desafio 5 (1800 XP)

Incorporeal Movement. The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Percepção) checks that rely on sight.

Ações

Life Drain. Ataque Corpo-a-Corpo com Arma: +6 para atingir, alcance 1.5 mt., one creature. Acerto: 21 (4d8 + 3) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a CD 14 (Constituição) ou its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

Create Specter. The wraith targets a humanoid within 3 metros of it that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute and died violently. The target's spirit rises as a specter in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at one time.
